events.name: Battle against Commander 1 (stalemate)
Eito kills Sirei in the gym after distracting him, blowing himself up and getting revived by the Review-O-Matic
Battle against Squad 1
Eito kills Hiruko in her sleep
Battle against Squad 2
Takumi wakes up at Second-to-Last Defense Academy
Battle at Second-to-Last Defense Academy against Squad 3
Supreme Commander destroys Second-to-Last Defense Academy
Battle against Squad 4
Takumi, Kurara, Nozomi, Kyoshika, and Yugamu arrive at Last Defense Academy and join the battle
Battle against Squad 5
So this isn't a real branch, this does just take you to Hundred Line 2.
So this isn't a real branch, if you hit "No" on the choice it just loops you and makes you choose again, and again, and again, etc.
Takumi merges with himself, discuss events with the Ghost, and enters the gym to prevent Eito from killing Sirei.
A message appears painted over a blackboard in one of the classrooms, stating that if the group did not leave the school they would die
Takumi manages to convince the SDU to leave the school, some through blackmail bluffing, but all do.
Takumi, Hiruko, Takemaru, and Shouma group up to go to Second to Last Defense Academy, with part of the idea being to train Shouma to get over himself.

The sub-group makes it to Second-to-Last Defense Academy after walking all day, and meets Nigou. The group goes in to explain everything and meet the other students. After Takumi and the main SDU explains what happened (time travel included), the groups merge and go back to LDA, without Nigou, taking the school bus.
The full SDU returns to LDA in the morning, and prepares for the upcoming attack.
Attack from Squad 1, the SDU successfully fights off the attack and defeats Murvrum. Yugamu, upon hearing him beg for his life, kills him and absorbs his hemoanima.

During the night, a random assortment of invaders breaches the border and begins attacking the school. Revealing itself to be squad 2 when the SDU moves to defend. Once again, the black hooded figure shows up to view the fight, this time entering the field to observe but not attacking. After Pakron's defeat the SDU attempts to contact Nigou to no response, worrying them, and causing Takumi to form a squad of himself, Hiruko, Darumi, Yugamu, and Tsubasa to go investigate StLDA.
The group arrives at StLDA to find it destroyed and Nigou's body in pieces, likely from a self-destruct. The group buries what was left and heads back.
Hiruko drops by Takumi's room at night to inform him that there will be an attack tomorrow, ahead of schedule.

The next morning, Hiruko is nowhere to be found. Kurara and Kyoshika have a minor argument as usual, then an attack begins. Meanwhile Darumi is also missing, thought to be in her room. Hiruko then shows up to fight with the SDU. As the SDU prepares, they discover there are two commanders attacking them: Squads 8 and 9. They merge together into one entity, but are still defeated by the SDU with the undying flame bomb.
The ghost enters Takumi's room to discuss events with him, and how the bomb took a lot of his strength, and that he's worried that the path towards the future might change.

Takumi wakes up at night, well past when he should have, falls back asleep, and wakes up in the bio-lab to see the Sponsor attacking Hiruko with a buzzsaw. Takumi attacks them, launches them out the window, and sprints to the wall of flames. Finding himself being attacked in a corner.
Takumi dodges the attack, and the Sponsor ends up in the wall of flame, burning up. However Takumi turns around to see another one, who injects his neck and causes him to pass out.

Takumi wakes up after noon and can't recall prior events. He goes to the cafeteria to find out something is wrong with Tsubasa who has locked herself in the garage working on something. Takumi asks Hiruko about what happened last night, where she responds that she just went for a walk, and to not bring up the subjects again. In the garage Takumi tries to get Tsubasa's attention, gets hit by accident, and finds that Tsubasa is repairing Sirei. However, he will not wake up even after she followed all instructions in the repair manual. Takumi hits Sirei and causes him to wake up. Tsubasa is mad about this.
Sirei announces that he will be conducting indivual interviews with each member in the SDU, starting with Takumi, in order to find out what happened when he was out.
Sirei listens to Takumi and gives him an assignment: harder VR missions.

Sirei approaches Takumi and informs him that he has also given other members of the SDU assignments, specifcally those that don't believe Takumi. As such, Takumi is to help them out and earn their trust to become a proper leader.

Attack by Squad 6 at night. After the defeat of the commander, she begs the SDU to spare her life, even going as far as taking off her helmet while asking for mercy. The SDU decides to take her prisoner and put her in the courtyard cages.
Sirei takes the captured commander to the infirmary in order to heal her.
Takumi is promoted to the leader of the SDU.
Eva joins the SDU as a new transfer student.

The LDA is under attack, as the SDU gathers in the war room, they find that Shouma has transformed into his muscle form once again. Then transforms back before the battle begins. The squad is revealed to be Squad 3, with Addamaque as the commander. He is swiftly defeated and absorbed.

The ghost shows up in Takumi's room, mad at him for spending time with everyone else and not even talking to him. Takumi offers to help him out, as soon as he's back from his trip with Eva to destroy an enemy base. Takumi promises to come back as soon as possible. After that Takumi gathers with the others on the mission: Darumi, Tsubasa, Kurara, and Eva.
The group moves out and finds an invader base to attack, finding it defended by Squad 4 and Quenzelle. The squad and commander are defeated and absorbed.

Takumi gets back and spends the entire next day in bed, not feeling even slightly guilty. The next morning he goes to the cafeteria, and gets yelled at by the group for not telling anyone. After heading back to his room he focuses on the assignments has to do with others.

Sirei shows up in Takumi's room to inform Takumi that he has a new bonus assignment. In this case, the Ghost baby, who specifically requested an assignment with Takumi's help: a hemoanima quiz on everyone in the group. After taking the quiz he is quite happy to be able to partake in a normal student activity with Takumi.

The attack alarm goes off, but on the way to the war room, everyone in the SDU keeps seeing odd objects and manifestations. Takumi informs the group that it is due to a commander with the ability to create illusions. At which point Sirei reveals he has a counter measure: a gigantic metal statue of himself made from all the things collected from assignments. Further he also states it is their secret weapon, however it is instantly destroyed by an explosion as soon as the invaders attack it. Right after that, the depressing music starts playing, as the giant Sirei's speakers are playing even louder now it has been destroyed. The SDU begins battle with Squad 11. The SDU battles and defeats Turamtammi, only for her to be revived by Nyewgank the commander of Squad 10. Despite this however, the SDU is able to defeat and absorb both.
Takumi feels like his choice greatly influenced his fate.

Takemaru barges into Takumi's room by knocking on his door, only to find that neither of them could speak. Takemaru takes Takumi to the cafeteria, where the entire SDU meet up, unable to speak. Kurara punches Gaku. Ima brought pen and paper for everyone so they could communicate. Yugamu determines that the group could still hear, just not the voices of each other, only Sirei's. Sirei gathrs everyone in the war room to inform them there's a jamming soundwave going around the school blocking their voices. He hands Darumi a microphone, and tells her to put it right to Takumi's ear, and yells "CAN YOU HEAR ME?", which he could, falling to the ground foaming at the mouth, blacking out for a few days.

Takumi goes to the cafeteria to find out what happened after he passed out, only to see Kyoshika crying over Hiruko's glasses as she thought they were her true form she had been reduced into. Hiruko then walks in, picks up her glasses, and informs him Sirei is creating a counter measure against the invaders.
Sirei shows up in Takumi's room to ask if he has collected all the items needed for, something, presumably something to reverse the voice removal effect.

Takumi is tasked with finding Kako who had vanished, which he does find her within a classroom looking out the window. Outside there is Ima, Takemaru, Nozomi, and Moko, appearing to try to spell or signal something to the group. He resolves to go outside and find out what they're doing, and tells Kako Tsubasa was looking for her. Outside Nozomi runs up to Takumi asking if he got their message, which he says not at all. They state that they were trying to spell out SOS, since they thought they saw an invader outside. Further, the reason they're all out there is the same reason Takumi was, they culdn't figure out each other's messages, and as it turns out the invader was just a pile of garbage. Everyone disbands.
Attack by Squad 7. The SDU is able to finish off Zen'ta and absorb her cryptoglobin.

Sirei informs the group in the morning to come to the war room as he has a gift, upon getting there he announces he actually has nothing, and that the SDU can continue as is with only minor issues. He does have a minor solution however, he gives everyone a tablet/smartphone they can use to text each other. However, he also informs them it is a one week special trial they get, but that they should not reverse engineer or try to mod them.
Takumi mourns Eito.

Takumi recieves a message from Darumi, a classic chain mail text about sending it to five people or being cursed, he ignores it and goes to sleep. However the next morning he is still worried about it, and talks to her about it, where she informs him that it was a text sent on sleep meds. However she does say it may be a legitmate curse, which worries Kyoshika.

Attack from a roaming screaming squad. The SDU is able to defeat them, but not without some mental wear and tear. However after the fight, they notice an enemy in a small machine, which Takemaru destroys. The machine plays an awful noise for a while, then shuts down, and let's the SDU speak again.
Takumi drafts 5 copies of message, and sends them all to Gaku. The next morning, Takumi enters the cafeteria to find that Gaku has recieved 27 copies of the message, from at least him and Kurara.
Takumi gains a persistent cough. The next morning he goes to Yugamu who claims to have medicine for his issue and that it is "incredibly effective". Takumi takes it, and wakes up many days later.

Takumi enters the cafeteria and discusses his issue, and agrees to let Yugamu examine him, however before that can happen, the school is attacked. After defeating the attacking group, everyone goes to bed. The next morning Takumi goes to Yugamu's room for his examination, after an hour he is informed that he is suffering from: Super Smartass Syndrome. The condition causes Takumi to gather smartass energy, which causes those around him to gather Clown Energy. Those with Super Smartass Syndrome have a 3% chance of exploding everytime they make a jab, retort, or similar remark. Just after learning this, and Takumi making a few remarks in the process, someone knocks at the door, Kurara, who informs them there was a fight in the cafeteria which is spreading to the gym, and that she will be participating. Upon arriving they find its a rap battle, after which learning about Takumi makes a remark and explodes, waking up next week.

Takumi wakes up and enters the cafeteria, finding only Nozomi there, who pulls him into a tight hug, then informs him that he looks tasty and she wants to eat him. Takumi, in order to get out of it, uses a tickle attack to get out of it. After this, he runs into an abandoned classroom, and hears a girl scream. Upon looking over, he sees Kurara without her mask, and doesn't even have to quip in order to explode, he wakes up next week again.
Upon waking up, Takumi is informed by Yugamu that even his internal monolog is enough to cause explosions, and that they fought a couple defesive battles without him.

Takumi runs into Darumi on the stairs on the way down, mostly ignores her, and when she tries to return to her room, trips on the stairs, and ends up ripping through Takumi's clothes in the process somehow.

Takumi wakes up to an attack by V'ehxness' squad, upon gathering in the war room, everyone is overcome by clown energy and starts making stupid comments and actions. However Sirei is able to start the battle before it gets so extreme as to have Takumi start retorting. Upon V'ehxness entering the fight, she has a fluttering in her chest and feelings of love for Takumi, with her body refusing to obey her and strength draining, the SDU engages her defeating and killing her.
The SDU gathers outside the school to celebrate, however Takumi and Yugamu realize that Smartass Syndrome isn't over and Takumi still has to fight through.
Takumi choses to start retorting to the group (clown car), and detonates. His soul rising up afterwards so he can look down on the group and their antics.
Takumi, instead of fighting against Smartass Syndrome or retorting, chooses to just clown out with the SDU. However his idea simply gets him stuck in the ground, and left there.
Takumi elects not to forward the message, and hears his doorbell rings and finds Darumi there informing him he will be cursed.

Takumi wakes up late and goes to find the cafeteria empty, then hears a shriek and runs to a classroom to find Darumi slumped against the wall with her head turned into that of a fish. With Kurara screaming at her in shock. Kyoshika reveals that this is a rare disease: Terminal Mackerel-Headitis. However, Darumi remains alive and capable of movement and speech.

Takumi wakes up to find Darumi in the cafeteria eating Miso-Mackerel soup as it is cheering her up. However, Takumi hears another scream and goes running to find that on the roof Hiruko has also contracted Terminal Mackerel-Headitis.
Takumi wakes up to the morning annoucement and finds that Gaku has also contracted Terminal Mackerel-Headitis.

Yugamu shows up at Takumi's room in the morning to promote the benefits of nude walking, and also that Takemaru has gained a fish head. Yugamu brings Takumi to the pool wherein they find Takemaru's head is that of a bonito, not a mackerel. They then take him back to his room.

Takumi wakes up to an attack on the school, heads to the defense room and finds everyone (including the Ghost Baby) there. Sirei reveals that the fish headed members can not fight as they lack 3D fish head models, as such the rest of the SDU sorties. The invaders had no commander controlling them and was dispatched by the SDU.

Takumi wakes up in the afternoon to find that Nozomi is feeling very unwell, collapses in his room, and comes to as a fish once aain, completly negating her rejection symptoms. She then collapses again and Kyoshika helps carry her back to her room.

Takumi wakes up and finds someone spamming his doorbell as the morning annoucement plays. He opens the door to find Ima who drags him to the cafeteria to find Kako has a bonito head. Just then, Kyoshika bursts in to inform them that she has found fish bones that might be the source. However after she leaves, Kako states that they're probably chicken bones she threw away recently.
Takumi heads to the cafeteria to find that Ima, Tsubasa, Eva, Shouma, and Moko have all gained mackerel heads. Takumi faints at this sight.
Takumi runs into Kyoshika in the hallway, who drags him into a classroom to see that Kurara's head has been replaced with a can of tomato and makerel.

Takumi wakes up to an attack on the school. The SDU enters the war room for Sirei to annouce that he has finished the fish 3D models, however Darumi reveals they can take the heads off and go back to normal. The SDU proceeds to sortie. After the first wave Dalh'xia reveals himself as the commander of the squad (Squad 0). However, he detransforms after a bit of fighting and leaves, telling the SDU their final showdown will come soon.

Takumi faints, and wakes up the next day, stuff after sleeping on the floor. After the day he realizes he has a mackerel head. Sirei shows up, informs Takumi that there is a 3D model for him and to not take off the fish head to waste his work.
Kyoshika rings Takumi's doorbell after the morning annoucement to inform him Yugamu has come down with a fish head, as well as herself, leaving no one normal.

Takumi wakes up to an attack on the school. Everyone removes their fish heads and sorties. After the first wave Dalh'xia once again shows up and fights the SDU. However, he very quickly reacts to the terrible stench of fish around the school, removing his shield and halving his health. As such the SDU is able to defeat him. After his defeat he begs for death, which the SDU complies with.
Takumi wakes up in the middle of the night to a visit from the Ghost Baby, who also has a fish head.

Takumi wakes up to an attack on the school by V'ehxness' squad. However, the invading force of invaders all have clams for heads, which Kyoshika informs the SDU is Terminal Scallop-Headitis. However similar to the SDU, the invaders all remove their heads before the battle. After the first wave V'ehxness appears, but also detests the smell of fish so much it damages her. The SDU defeats and absorbs her. Afterwards the SDU tries to solve the mystery of the fish heads.

branch.name: Have You Figured Out the Truth?

events.name: The SDU gathers in the courtyard on day 100 as the school enters attack mode, and Takumi reveals the truth. Which is that Darumi did all this, by eating canned fish, which Darumi denies. He then states that it began when Darumi ate mackerel in miso soup, which occured after she transformed. He then posits that the water was fish stock, which was also rejected. He then blames Gaku, which is also rejected. Afterwards everyone boards the escape pod. Kyoshika ends the route on a fish pun, to Takumi's anger.
Takumi finds himself on the beach lost in thought, as he realizes there is no way for them to know the truth, and has returned to the ocean his true home.
Darumi asks Takumi to convince the others to join the killing game, which he does
The mysterious Sponsor appears in the Leisure Lounge and begins the Invader Hunt by killing Kurara via cryptoglobin draining bees
Hiruko turns Darumi into her pet dog due to her hyper reaction to the killing game
Hiruko reveals to Takumi that she has determined a method to kill the bees that guard the Sponsor, and forms the "Anti-Sponsor Alliance" with Takumi as its leader
Yugamu joins the Anti-Sponsor Alliance
Hiruko reveals to Takumi Darumi's mental state
Hiruko and Darumi when attempting to retrieve the Sponsor's spare suit, run into Squad 3 commander and Hiruko is mortally injured
Takumi, Darumi, and Yugamu drive back the squad 3 commander, saving Darumi
Darumi kills Hiruko and absorbs her cryptoglobin
Tsubasa reveals that she witnessed the battle and Hiruko's death and joins the Anti-Sponsor Alliance to make amends and save lives, working to analyse the spare suit

Takumi attacks the Sponsor with a crossbow since the suit is only immune to Hemoanima based attacks, landing 3 shots and piercing the suit. Yugamu wearing the spare suit then takes over the attack as Takumi leaves to avoid the bees. Yugamu then shoves a bomb of undying flame into the holes in the suit, killing the Sponsor.
2 more entities wearing sponsor suits are found in the room with the medical machines and inject Takumi with something, knocking him out, saying they are not involved with the Invader Hunt
Takumi wakes up, goes to the cafeteria to discuss with Yugamu and Tsubasa, and discovers he was out for an entire day and that he was apparently moving around and acting strangely yesterday
Battle against Squad 3

After defeating Squad 3, the Sponsor reveals themselves to still be alive and have multiple bodies. Then absorbs the commander's cryptoglobin and redistributes it to the top 3 scorers in the Invader Hunt: Darumi, Takumi, and Yugamu
The first round of the Invader Hunt comes to a close and Shouma is executed. The Sponsor then gives a 7 day break before resuming the game.
Eva reveals that she has a daughter (adoptive, born as her niece) named Kamyhun, and made Eva's mask.

Nozomi, Moko, and Kyoshika join the Anti-Sponsor Alliance after Takumi gives up his cryptoglobin reward to prevent Nozomi's rejection syndrome. The new alliance stays up partying and getting intoxicated.
The new team makes a pair of headphones for everyone on the team in case the audio commander appears.
Takumi blacks out and mysteriously delivers the QB liquid to help repair the damaged escape pod to Tsubasa, being vague on where he got it. Tsubasa then fills in Takumi on these events at night.
The Squad 10 commander ambushes Nozomi, Moko, and Kyoshika, gravely wounding Nozomi.

Takumi leaves Moko behind in order to bring Nozomi back to the SDU safely. Moko accepts this fate, and knocks Kyoshika out to prevent her from arguing. Moko gives Takumi her golden earbuds. As they drive away, they look back to see how Moko is faring as she says she will not allow the commander to pass while she is still alive.

Upon getting back, they leave Nozomi in her room, and head to the defense room. The Sponsor appears and informs them that the rest of the SDU is stuck in the illusion world, and only the anti-Sponsor squad plus Darumi is ok. The reminaing members begin the battle against Squad 11.
The awake SDU members destroy the sources of noise, causing Turamtammi to enter the battle.
Squad 10 enters the battle.
After the battle, the Sponsor steps in, takes the cryptoglobin, and distributes it to Darumi, Takumi, and Yugamu. Takumi injects his into Nozomi in order to heal her.

Yugamu enters Takumi's room to inform him that Nozomi's health is failing. Takumi determines its due to rejection symptoms. They go to ask Eva for a cryptoglobin donation, but she refuses due to it being a taboo. Takumi offers her escape in exchange for her blood, and she accepts. They bring Nozomi to Eva, and have her literally drink blood from Eva's neck. Nozomi starts blurting out memories and statements about her mother, Eva attempts to console her about the choices that were made.

Takumi goes to speak with Eva the next day, where she calls Nozomi "my dear Nozomi", and reveals that they are now blood relatives and that she was able to see into Nozomi's memories. Afterwards, Nozomi comes in feeling better and unable to remember the events. Nozomi then calls her mommy, then says it was a mistake. Nozomi asks to take over and Eva's caretaker and Eva asks to stay for a few days until she is better.

Takumi goes to check on Eva and Nozomi, and finds Nozomi within Eva's cage feeding her, to Eva's embarrassment. Eva mentions that Nozomi's cooking skills need work, and they start speaking liking mother and daughter. Nozomi stays behind as everyone else ventures out for points.

Takumi enters the courtyard to find Eva and Nozomi fighting, after Nozomi storms off Takumi asks what happened. Eva reveals that she told Nozomi that her mother was a piece of trash who gave up on life after subjecting her own child to inhumane experiments. Eva then starts to worry that she made Nozomi hate her. Takumi goes to check on Nozomi, and convince her to try and fight. Takumi uses this to try and drive a wedge between them, but it backfires instantly and Nozomi snaps at him to not talk about Eva like that. Takumi proceeds to go off on Nozomi after this and tells her she needs to fight. Nozomi counters by stating that she saw Eva's memories in a dream and understands that Eva never wanted to fight, and hated life until adopting her daughter Kamyuhn. Takumi understands, but still asks Nozomi to focus on this after the end of the second round. Nozomi states however that she will not fight the invaders anymore and that she will be the one to die in the second round.

The anti-Sponsor alliance heads back to the SDU in order to kidnap Nozomi and force her onto the battlefield. However upon arriving they find Takemaru, Ima, and Kako attempting to take Eva and drag her out and kill her for points. Nozomi is defending her, beaten and bloody, then she passes out. The Anti-Sponsor Alliance begins a battle against Takemaru's team, winner decides Eva's fate.
The Anti-Sponsor Alliance wins the fight, bring Takemaru's team to the Revive-O-Matic, and then check in on Eva and Nozomi, who are exchanging blood again.
The Anti-Sponsor Alliance releases Eva who intends to go to a safehouse with her daughter until the war ends.
Nozomi wakes up 2 days after, promises to survive the hunt and continue on so she can see Eva again some day.

The entire SDU (after a small fight between factions), leaves on the bus to go find an invader base to score many points. With the Anti-Sponsor Alliance hoping it will allow them to secure enough points for Nozomi via killing a commander. Upon arriving though, Nozomi senses Eva. The rest of the SDU tells her to ignore it for now and focus on killing enemies. The battle begins.
Quenzelle (Squad 4 Commander) enters the battle.

After defeating the commander, they find Nozomi missing. They find her with Eva, who asks Nozomi to get her water and painkillers, then asks Takumi why they're really here. Takumi explains about the Sponsor and the killing game. Eva in response, digs into her eyes, and pulls out 2 small circuits. Telling Takumi to decipher the red one at the SDU and give the blue one to "whom it is due". She then pulls out a small bead from her throat, that is the detonator for the bomb implanted within Eva's body. Eva asks Takumi to have Nozomi detonate it to score points in the hunt. Nozomi comes back and Takumi has to decide whether to have Nozomi detonate the bomb or not.

Takumi gives Nozomi the detonator and has her squeeze it, there's a bright flash that blinds them both for minutes. After it fades, Nozomi is wondering where Eva went, seemingly not knowing that she died.
The SDU arrives back at LDA, just in time to put Nozomi to bed and have a battle against Squad 7 begin.

Kyoshika falls into last place, and is executed by the Sponsor at midnight. Yugamu reveals that he poisoned Kyoshika shortly before her death, and it is now within the Sponsor and all their bodies. The last remaining Sponsor body demands that the bees attack Yugamu, but they do not since he has not broken any rules. With this the Sponsor dies, although he reveals that the hunt continues even if he dies, and that their will has passed onto their successor who will continue the game. After this, they detonate their own body and fade.

Tsubasa barges into Takumi's room and informs him that what was on the red chip was a map that Eva left, and that they can arrive there and back with the bus within the day. They arrive to find a cave, inside they find Eva's daughter who asks for water after being woken up and carried out by them. Takumi, to prove he knew Eva, gives Kamyuhn the blue chip. Who runs back into the cave, and does not emerge. This forces Takumi and Tsubasa to share a blanket on the bus somewhat awkwardly, before talking and settling into the mood and discussing their past. Eventually they fall asleep.

Kamyuhn eventually comes out of the cave and informs Takumi and Tsubasa that she went through the chip and saw Eva's memories since leaving. Even learning that Eva died for Nozomi, she tries to pass it off as her not caring, but shortly into it breaks down into tears. Takumi and Tsubasa take her back to the SDU so she can meet Nozomi at her request, and also to take care of her. They stash her in the rocket room since the Anti-Sponsor Alliance is the only group that knows of it. Finally, they bring Nozomi there to introduce them to each other. Nozomi instantly hugs Kamyuhn and shrieks in joy, treating her as a little sister already.
Battle against a commanderless squad, that begins screaming.

After the battle, the Anti-Sponsor Alliance goes to speak with Kamyuhn, where she reveals she is a Shrine Maden who's cryptoglobin gives her godly wisdom, albeit unable to transform. Kamyuhn joins the Anti-Sponsor Alliance.

After waking up, someone uses the speakers to announce that the third round of the Invader Hunt is starting and to come to the leisure lounge for more info. Upon arriving they find, the Sponsor, albeit with a higher pitched voice and new speaking style, but the same suit. They request to be called just the Sponsor as well. They do reveal that they only have the one body, Yugamu attempts to attack with a standard knife after being challenged to a one-on-one fight with the Sponsor. Yugamu however, detonates, with the Sponsor revealing that they have a remote that allows them to detonate the bombs placed in everyone (it has cute chibi buttons for everyone still alive).
After that, the Anti-Sponsor Alliance meets with Kamyuhn who reveals that she can fix the rocket's motherboard in only 5 days.
The Anti-Sponsor Alliance begins working on the escape pod in the afternoons after hunting in the mornings. After 5 days, the pod is fully repaired.

Tsubasa asks Takumi for a reward for her hard work, reminding Takumi that he said he was going to do things properly. As he is about to kiss her as she seemingly wants, Kamyuhn reveals that the rocket is out of fuel, interrupting them. They pull Yugamu and Nozomi in to inform them of this. Kamyuhn further states that the fuel for the rocket is cryptoglobin, Kamyuhn suggests using Dahl'xia for the fuel.
Throughout the days the Anti-Sponsor Alliance is unable to find any invaders, worrying them since Tsubasa is in last place.
Battle against a commanderless screaming squad.

The Anti-Sponsor Alliance agrees to add Darumi to the group in order to be able to find invaders. Takumi goes to her room to spam her doorbell to try and find her. He enters her room to find her in there, just staring blanking at the ceiling, and saying how bored she was. She then starts to bang her head against the wall trying to kill herself. Takumi stops her, explains the the idea and plan, and asks her to join. Darumi, gets very mad at the idea of ending the game and says she will not let them destroy it, yelling at Takumi to get out.

As the Anti-Sponsor Alliance is out looking for invaders, Darumi finds them and states they are trying to take away the only thing she loves. She then states she is going to kill them, and the battle begins.
The Alliance binds Darumi with rope, and takes her back to the school.

The Alliance once again goes out to search for invaders, but Darumi once again finds them and fights them. After defeating her, she starts foaming at the mouth, forcing the alliance to take her back again. The Alliance elects to lock her in a cage in the courtyard, but upon going to her room they find her missing, and not anywhere in the school.

As the Alliance is out hunting, once again Darumi finds them and is ready to start a fight. However, Dahl'xia appears and challenges them to a fight. Darumi offers to act as a distraction as the Alliance hits him with one large attack. The battle begins.

Dahl'xia after crossing blades with the Alliance, declares them as true warriors and says he will fight them properly at the school. However, he calls Tsubasa a coward and says she doesn't deserve to live, throwing a blade at her. Darumi however, jumps in and takes the attack, then asks to be killed so she can be worth points. The Alliance shoves Darumi onto the bus and floors it back to the LDA, wherein she dies and is revived by the Revive-O-Matic. After that, Darumi reveals that all she really wants is for everyone to kill each other, however Yugamu counters that she's been following because she actually wants to help. Elaborating on his theory, and revealing that everyone in the SDU is a target in the hunt, which is why she wanted them to kill her. Darumi then reveals that she wanted to die like Hiruko, and asks for them to kill her outside of school grounds so they can gain the points. She also states that she can never be happy now that she has killed Hiruko, her first and only friend, and that she doesn't deserve to live after doing so. Tsubasa after hearing this, promises to be Darumi's friend. Tsubasa to show Darumi how prepared she is, reaches out, grabs Darumi's face, and kisses her. Tsubasa then reveals that was her first kiss, an that she is ready to be hurt for Darumi. Darumi then calls her Mistress Tsubasa and promises to follow her for the rest of her life, asking her to kiss her again, then begging her to, then following her out saying she'll follow her to the end of the Earth. Yugamu then asks Takumi to help him show the girls a real girl, Takumi refuses.
The Sponsor approaches Takumi to tell him that they know where the invaders are. They offer Takumi the choice of asking and learning.

After Takumi asks where the invaders are, the Sponsor hands them a map directing them to a location. Takumi gathers the Alliance, and they take the bus to what seems to be an abandoned mansion. Deep within it, they find many, many invaders. However, after fighting through all the invaders, a group of people come out ready to attack them. The Alliance attempts to leave, but the Sponsor's voice informs them (via bee) that if they leave now Tsubasa will not have enough points and will die. The Sponsor informs them these people are invaders and count as kills, the Sponsor reveals that this is an invader factory and that these people were going to be turned into invaders. They further state these people are worth a very large amount of points. Everyone in the Alliance, even Yugamu, refuses to kill people, until the Sponsor reminds them that Tsubasa will die otherwise. Takumi, willing summons and channels Eito from within, raising his sword to kill, swinging it down as Tsubasa screams.

Takumi hides in his bed for a few days, until Nozomi shows up and informs him that the third round ended, revealing that Takemaru was the one who died. She also reads out a letter from Takemaru apologizing to Takumi, asking him to forgive Ima and kako.

Various people and groups (Nozomi, Yugamu and Darumi, Kamyuhn, the Sponsor, Tsubasa) all visit Takumi to tell him things as he is rotting away, most of them trying to cheer him up and get him out of bed (except the Sponsor who makes fun of him). Culminating in Tsubasa coming in, kissing Takumi, and convincing him to get up with dreams of a better future.

Takumi gathers the Alliance the discuss the plan, they reveal that the next round will be between days 84 and 100. However, they also realize that Dahl'xia can be used as a source of cryptoglobin fuel for the rocket. Kamyuhn suggests using poison to breakdown his defense, however they also discuss the problem of the Sponsor. They ask Takumi which to target first.

route.name: 085: Killing Game Route: A Cruel End for Kamyuhn

events.name: Dahl'xia shows up and starts a battle against the SDU.
The Sponsor sends his bees at Dahl'xia after his defeat, absorbing all his cryptoglobin. They then split the cryptoglobin between Darumi, Takumi, and Yugamu.

The Alliance gathers in the rocket room, but can't find Kamyuhn. They look all around, but can't find her, before finally running into the Sponsor. They reveal that killed her and put her cryptoglobin in the syringes with Dahl'xia. Eventually they find her body in a corner of the schoolyard. Nozomi after seeing this, charges directly at the Sponsor, and is executed by the bees.
Takumi summons Darumi and Yugamu to his room and enacts a plan with them, swap the bombs in him and Darumi, which Yugamu does.

Takumi attacks the sponsor using the old sponsor suit, causing the Sponsor to attempt to blow him up but really killing Darumi. Causing the game to be shut down. The Sponsor then reveals themselves to be an Eito from another timeline, who is willing to give answers to Takumi and only him. However Tsubasa kills him out of rage before he can do anything. With the game over the group celebrates and falls asleep outside.

Dalh'xia sneaks into the school, wakes up Takumi and the group, and then begins his attack. After his defeat, he is killed by V'ehxness who absorbs his cryptoglobin and informs the SDU that her army has grown ever larger because of them and will be launching a full out attack very shortly.

Kamyuhn comes to Takumi's room at night to inform him that V'ehxness has amassed the largest army in history and that the SDU has no chance of winning the fight, unless they were to kill the divine baby Shion. Kamyuhn informs him that because of the blood already on his hands, he is obliated to continue and take at least one more life if it will save them.

route.name: 086: Killing Game Route: So Close Yet So Far" with depth 10

events.name: Takumi heads to the baby's room in the middle of the night, in order to kill him. However, before he could break down the door, the baby shows up in his ghost form to discuss events and his plan with Takumi. Wherein he reveals that the bloodspace aura that was affecting him suddenly vanished a few days ago and that he has been investiating since. Further, he informs Takumi that he has accepted his death, and is willing to give his life for the escape pod, on one condition: Takumi may not board the pod, as he has done too much already to go back. Takumi agrees to it, but in reality is intending to board the pod anyways after the baby's death. Takumi then goes forward into the defense room and kills the baby, causing the system to shutdown and send out an emergency alert. Takumi then runs back to Kamyuhn and gives her the body, then runs to gather the SDU and take them to the escape pod. In the pod, the group puts together what happened. Kamyuhn starts up the escape pod sequence and final day sequence as everyone straps in after sharing the guilt with Takumi. However, shortly before takeoff, the entire system shuts off, with the escape pod not having enough energy to launch. With the baby's blood itself seeming to refuse to allow the launch to take place. Takumi is unable to work up the resolve to get off the escape pod, and everyone rushed off the escape pod to V'ehxness invading. The SDU was able to take down her and her army, but at the cost of every one of their lives.

route.name: 087: Killing Game Route: Hote From Despair

events.name: Takumi refuses to kill the baby and informs Kamyuhn of his choice. Instead asking her to try to attach his capsule to the escape pod so they could take him with them when they go to the satellite. Kamyuhn rejects this and says she will do it herself, but just then the ghost form of the baby appears before them, revealing the bloodspace aura that has been plaguing him vanished a few days ago. Takumi asks him to fight with them in the last fight, he agrees saying that he will increase the wall of fire's strength and use it to block as many invaders as possible.

V'ehxness begins her invasion, however with the baby boosting the wall of fire the amount of invaders that make it through is greatly reduced. Eventually the SDU defeats V'ehxness and her army, with Takumi killing her.
The SDU boards the escape pod, using V'ehxness's cryptoglobin as the fuel, with the baby and Kamyuhn, being brought along. With the SDU landing on the satellite and ready to start their new life.

route.name: 088: Killing Game Route: Escaping Our Fate

events.name: Takumi declines the help of the Sponsor and returns to his room, soon after he leaves with his group to find more invaders. Spending 2 days but unable to find any.

The group decides to head into the desert to try and find D'ahlxia in order to defeat him and get Tsubasa out of last place. Takumi struggles through the night trying to think of another way that doesn't involve killing SDU members or likely dying to D'ahlxia. He and Tsubasa in the morning take the school bus and leave, hoping the bee following them will eventually die off. Further it will prevent the game from advancing as Tsubasa can not be executed to continue the game. After just a few hours the bee appears to have vanished, after a few more hours when night falls they decide to sleep until morning. Takumi promises to protect Tsubasa forever no matter what, as they fall asleep. However during the night the bee sneaks into the bus and drains Tsubasa as Takumi is sleeping.

route.name: 089: Killing Game Route: Battle For Eva's Points

events.name: Takumi elects not to kill Eva as she is basically an ally to them at this point, Nozomi walks over as they are arguing and Takumi explains the situation, where she also refuses. As they are arguing, Takemaru, Ima, and Kako run over and reveal they've killed the squad 4 commander and will now go after Eva. A battle between the SDU breaks out, resulting in Eva transforming to try and protect Nozomi. The end result is that the SDU obliterates themselves, except Kyoshika who was not there.

route.name: 090: Killing Game Route: The Academy Falls

events.name: Takumi refuses to leave Moko behind and everyone fights to beat back the Squad 10 Commander.

The team returns to find the school destroyed, likely by other commanders as they were busy fighting the Squad 10 commander, Nozomi dying from her injuries, and everyone left forced to wander the ruins for the rest of their days.

Takumi decides not to join the Invader Hunt, the rest of the SDU also rejects joining, except Darumi who is too excited to participate in a killing game. However as the rest of the SDU rejects it, Darumi understands she can not play a killing game alone and also rejects it. Finally the scheduled time of 7pm rolls around, Takumi enters the pool room, shouts that the SDU will not be joining the game, and leaves. The SDU gathers in the cafeteria, as they decide on the sleeping arrangements, they do decide on sleeping in their own rooms (excepting the twins).

The SDU gathers in the cafeteria to celebrate nothing happening. Afterwards Tsubasa brings Eva's mask to Takumi's room at his request so he can return it, and informs him it has many high tech features, such as infrared night vision, zoom functions, organic life detection, a 30 minute oxygen tank, and that its custom made to fit Eva's face. Tsubasa also suggests using Eva for defense, but implanting or using a bomb on her as insurance she can't betray them. Takumi enters the courtyard to return Eva's mask.

Takumi wakes up to the morning annoucement, only to hear Shouma scream, members of the SDU rush to the outside to find that Shouma has died from what appears to be multiple stab wounds to the torso. Kyoshika points out that only Ima, Kako, and Darumi aren't present. They rush Shouma to the infirmiary as several members go looking for the missing 3. Takumi and Hiruko find the gym door locked from the inside, and break it down, only to find Kako poisoned with a bottle in her hand, they also rush her to the infirmiary as Takumi picks up the bottle. Hiruko demands that Yugamu and Nozomi take her to the infirmary, everyone else except Takumi and Hiruko continues to look for the other two. Hiruko discusses the events with Takumi, specifically that it was a locked room death and that Kako may have killed herself by drinking TTX poison, but that there could also be someone still in the gym. They search but are unable to find anyone, noting that its unlikely that Kako and Shouma died near the same time as her body was already cold and likely had been dead for hours. Hiruko and Takumi go to the infirmary to find out that Shouma has been revived but is unconcious, and that Kako could not be revived as she died between the hours of 01:00 and 04:00 (estimated), with traces of TTX in her body likely from oral ingestion. Darumi comes in and states she was playing slots in the rec room as she woke up late, finally Ima enters and says he was looking for Kako as when he woke up she was already gone. Takumi informs the SDU that Kako is dead and can not be revived, causing them to all tear up, and for Ima to fully break down. Yugamu gets an anesthetic and injects Ima, knocking him out until tomorrow. Hiruko and Takumi inform the rest of the SDU aout what they found in the gym. At night the SDU gathers in the pool room as no one felt like eating. Darumi presents the idea that it was the Sponsor who killed Kako, Gaku, Sirei, and attempted to kill Shouma. Hiruko also states that the culprit could be one of the SDU. Tensions rise as accusations are thrown around, Takumi's group, Darumi, Eva, an outsider, etc. Tsubasa says she can make a life detector in 7 days, allowing them to see how many people are alive on school grounds. Right after this, Takumi passes out.

Takumi wakes up 12 days later. He finds Nozomi watching over him, who after screaming due to being shocked he woke up, informs him he likely has fainting disease and passed out from the shock and stress. They put him in the Revive-O-Matic, and found that there was treatment on damaged parts of his brain likely resulting in the disease. Further he also finds that nothing has changed in the days since, no one has died but no progress has been made.

After going to the cafeteria to eat and seeing his teammates, Takumi returns to his room. Tsubasa shows up and informs Takumi the life detector was finished 5 days ago, and has been reading 13 people ever since, ie. the SDU and Eva. This has caused trust between members to vanish as they al suspect it was an SDU member who did the killing. Takumi lists the likely suspects: Darumi, Nozomi, Kyoshika, Yugamu, Moko, Ima, and Kurara. Takumi elects to find the real killer, and sets out to do so.

Takumi investigates by asking SDU members about things. He finds Shouma awake in the pool room, who tells him the attempted killer was wearing a mask and a long black robe, and had a voice changer on when they yelled "Die! Die!" at him. Hiruko in the morgue informs Takumi that Kako's body was drained of cryptoglobin AFTER being placed in the morgue via a small cut on her ankle, further there's a hole in her back from someone removing her heart. The other 2 bodies have the same hole, and that the holes were made after day 27 when Takumi was asleep. Yugamu in the bio lab informs him that some supplies were stolen at least by day 27, namely some anesthetic, needles, and TTX, and that the anesthetic in low doses would numb pain but not knock someone out. Takemaru, Tsubasa, and Takumi, all people marked safe from being the killer, find a hatch in the gym that leads to an underground area storing the escape pod, meaning it could have been a murder and that the murderer could have hidden down here until Hiruko and Takumi left. Further, they find a hankerchief in the room with IT branded on it. The group informs everyone of the storeroom with the escape pod. Finally the SDU gathers in the cafeteria and discusses events. After they accuse Ima of possibly being involved, he runs off out of the school, and is kidnapped by the Squad 4 commander. However Tsubasa informs the group she implanted a tracker into him when bringing him food. The SDU determines where he was and splits into 2 groups, one to stay behind and one to go resuce him. With the rescue team consisting of: Takumi, Eva, Tsubasa, Takemaru, Hiruko, and Kurara.

The resuce team heads out to the invader base to fight the commander, Quenzelle, who Eva remarks is an absolute creep and to feel free to make mincemeat out of him. The SDU defeats him, however he points behind us and yells "OVERLORD V'EHXNESS!" and uses the oppertunity of them turned around to run. Eva makes a terrible pun about Quenzelle being Quencelled. They find Ima locked in a cage, and pull him out, however it detonates a nearby bomb. Takumi shields Ima from the blast with his body, taking most of the brunt.

Takumi wakes up 10 days later to see Nozomi watching over him again, once again he was out for most of the time due to the fainting disease. In the time he was out Ima has joined in on defensive battles. Takumi rushes over to Ima's room to ask him some questions, such as why he didn't kill Darumi. Which he says was because it was possible for someone else to be his sister's killer so he didn't kill her as it was possible for someone else to have done it. He then shows Takumi that the escape pod storage room has a large vent with the cover off that anyone could have fit through to escape. Further he didn't bring this up because he knew about the escape pod because he and Kako were going to try to escape on their own. They father Tsubasa to get a recon drone and fly it into the vent, within they find a large piece of green cloth. Further since it was found past the curves only a small person could fit through, it appears to only match to one person. Takumi gathers everyone in the gym and annouces he has determined who killed Kako and stabbed Shouma.
Takumi is forced to pick the killer [as a game choice similar to route branches].

branch.name: Who Killed Kako and Stabbed Shouma?

events.name: Takumi reveals that Shouma was the killer, and begins a persuasion against him. Takumi lays out every part of Shouma's plan, including having him partly admit it by accident. However aftterwards Shouma reveals that he was ordered to kill Kako by someone he refers to as X, who Shouma says killed Gaku and intended to kill him next but would let him off if he followed their instructions. To kill Kako and Ima in the gym, however only Kako showed up, but Shouma still went through with it. After Shouma made it to the surface, X showed up and informed Shouma to stab himself to take him off the suspect list, and gave him the knife and needle, and likely cleaned them up after as well. Shouma fails to detonate afterwards, Ima in response charges him, and starts to strangle him, Takumi manages to pull Ima off before killing him. They move Shouma into a courtyard cage and head to bed.

The next day Takumi wakes up to find Nozomi shouting for the group, and says she went to check out Shouma early, they find him stabbed in his cage, although the door is locked. Takumi unlocks the door and finds that his pulse is gone, but his neck and clothes are wet, although he was likely dead too long to revive. The revive-o-matic says that he likely died between 02:00 and 05:00, from a blade about 8 inches long, and that too much time has passed and there is not enough cryptoglobin in the body to revive. They move his body to the morgue, then investigate the courtyard, where all they find is a deflated balloon. Later in the rec room they discuss who X could be, and check the life detector to see that it only registers 12 people, and that the history log only detected a decrease never an increase. The SDU all gathers in the gym where they have set up a camp for everyone to sleep together, with a sentry system of 3 people, rotating one out each hour.

Takumi wakes up many days later in the gym, finding everyone still alive due to the advice he gave of staying in groups of 3. Further 10 days ago Shion appeared and informed the SDU that there was a distress signal that could be used to signal the satellite in the event of only one person remaining. The SDU has been searching for it since but has been unable to find it. Takumi brings Tsubasa and Hiruko to the courtyard to investigate, they then head to the Gift-O-Matic to see if it has a log of someone making the balloon, they find out its been crafted 100 times, and it is very durable and able to hold 5 litres of air. Takumi once mores gathers everyone in the gym, then the courtyard, to announce who killed Shouma.

Takumi accuses Eva and begins a persuasion against her. He succeeds, however Eva then informs them that X threatened Eva as well. This time with the remote detonator, meaning that it had to have been an SDU member. Further X can not press the button as it would obliterate everyone in the room, including themselves. Eva then says that X was in the same outfit and voice changer that Shouma said, but that she figured out who it was by their mannerisms. However Takumi realizes that this could go very badly if she were to say it.

Takumi decides not to silence Eva. Who then refuses to say, as she doesn't actually know and was afraid to die. However she then raises her hand in the motion to blow herself up, Takumi tackles her, but is kicked away. She then asks "Is this the courage you said I didn't have?" as she detonates herself.

Takumi wakes up 5 days later, to find Tsubasa and Moko have vanished. The night before it was Kurara on shift with them, when she was jabbed in the neck likely with a needle and knocked out. The SDU begins a search for them, and finds both dead and strung up from a tree. The revive-o-matic informs them that both died that morning between 05:00 and 08:00, stabbed or slit with a large blade. Further the rest of the SDU is now aware of the hears being stolen, however Tsubasa has what is most likely a "2" written on her back without a stolen heart. Moko however had nothing. When night falls Kurara finds the life detector in Tsubasa's space and shows it, it shows a 9, the same number of people here. The SDU decides to go back to sleeping in their own rooms and not opening the door until morning.

Right after the bedtime annoucement, Hiruko rings Takumi's doorbell and asks him to meet her in the morgue if he trusts her. Takumi runs to the morgue, to find out what she remembered. She shows Tsubasa's number and says its her Livor Mortis Code, which is a unique numbre that appears on the back of SDU members from team 1 when they lost almost all of their cryptoglobin. Shouma's heart is also missing, as was Kako's, all in the location that the code would have shown up on. Further its also likely that the heart was removed as a red herring. She further reveals that X's motivation is related to the code and obtaining the full sequence. Further they determine that the correct sequence of codes to be entered into the distress transmitter is the Livor Motis Code of 9 members. Finally they determine that if they find the transmitter, they'll likely find something about X's identity and set out to look for it. Failing to.

The next morning after the search, Hiruko and Takumi hide themselves as they find Karura come down then go up. After some poking around, they find a secret door leading to a dark staircase, and head down it. They find a very cold room, with the distress signal transmitter in it. However they then find Kurara's body (sans mask) and that she has been dead for some time. They determine the person wearing Kurara's clothes are X themselves. Route lock.
Eito is imprisoned within the courtyard for his crimes.
Takumi reveals to the SDU that he is a time traveller.

Takumi overhears Sirei interrogating Eito, specifically mentioning the phrase "defect" in regards to his condition. Eito then asks if Sirei was able to predict Takumi coming back, which he was not. Eito also asked if Takumi was actually human or not, mentioning that he's never felt this way about a human before.
Battle against Squad 1.
Takumi, Hiruko, Tsubasa, Shouma leave the academy to go to Second-to-Last Defense Academy and prevent Moko from being captured.

Upon arrival they find that the attack has happened earlier, and that Yugamu, Kyoshika, and Kurara are already dead. Nozomi and Moko went after Nigou who was captured. A call from Sirei comes in informing everyone that Last Defense Academy is under attack and that they are needed back there.
Takumi and the others rush to save Moko and Nozomi and find the enemy base north of Second-to-Last Defense Academy, and battle Squad 5 and their commander.
Branch campus is saved, and everyone rushes back to Last Defense Academy. Upon arriving they find the school on the ropes and under attack by Squad 2.
Darumi is killed and has her hemoanima absorbed by Little Black Riding Hood.
Sirei and Nigou task Hiruko and Takumi with gathering materials to make a bomb filled with undying flame.
Takumi, Hiruko, and Kyoshika explore the ruins and find the materials for the bomb, while Kyoshika is looking for the mythical Tsuchinoko as Kurara asked her to in order to make up with Nozomi.
Battle against Squads 8 & 9, where during the final wave their commanders fused together into a combined form.
Supreme Commander V'ehxness after absorbing commanders 8 and 9 begins a battle against the Special Defense Unit, alone.

Supreme Commander V'ehxness wipes out all of the SDU except Takumi, Nozomi, Takemari, Kyoshika, and Tsubasa. Takumi realizes the only way to defeat her is with the undying flame bomb, although someone needs to sacrifice themselves to activate it via hemoanima.

Takumi asks Takemaru to sacrifice himself to detonate the Undying Flames bomb which he agrees to. When Kyoshika asks why not her, Takemaru says he could not let a girl destroy herself for this, and that its his duty to clean up after his crew. He makes Takumi promise that he will save the rest of the SDU and humanity.
Takemaru detonate the bomb, wiping the battlefield clean in one blow and killing V'ehxness.
The Ghost boy comes to Takumi's room to discuss events with him and try to cheer him up.
Kurara rushes into the cafeteria apologizing to Nozomi, without her mask on. Takumi learns before then that they had a long conversation and ended up making up.

Yugamu shows up to Takumi's room and gives him drugs that he says "affects hemoanima and enables certain… physical changes". Comparing it to doping, and that he shelved it after Takemaru revealed some bad expierence with drugs prior. He also states it boosts him pheromones, and that this will help Takumi to bring everyone together as team leader.

Takumi takes the drugs, is knocked out for an entire day plus the next one, and then enters the cafeteria. He is informed that his vibe is now different and notable, and Kyoshika seems somewhat embarrassed about this.
Everyone Takumi talks to mentions how great he looks, or how excited they are to be around him.
Battle against against Squad 7.
Nozomi is unaffected by Takumi's pheromones.
Eva is affected by Takumi's pheromones.
Eva is taken prisoner.
Eito broke out and escaped at some point last night.
Yugamu reveals he's been slipping more and more meds into Takumi's food and drinks, including the water he just gave him.
Yugamu informs Takumi that the drugs should wear off in 3 to 4 days.
Sirei and Nigou show up in Takumi's room and tell him to double down on the drugs since its bringing everyone together, and that it also only effects Takumi.
Battle against Squad 7.
Eito sneaks in with the fake copies, and is also affected by the pheromones.

Eito is defeated, and he specifically mentions that he sees and smells Takumi as beautiful, unlike every other human until now. Eito confirms he sees Eito as a god, and he also informs us V'ehxness is still alive, and that he won't betray us again or anything. He then instantly sprints off as fast as he can.

Sirei informs the SDU he is implimenting a reward system, one well performing student will get to spend time with Takumi as a reward. He then picks Tsubasa as the first one to receive a reward, and is informed she gets to spend some time alone wiht Takumi, after the evening annoucement.

Tsubasa shows up to Takumi's room after the evening annoucement, and confesses her love for him. Even stating that he is now her own reason for fighting, and wants Takumi to touch her as much possible.

Gaku shows up to Takumi's room after the morning annoucement and tells Takumi how much he likes him, in fact stating that he only liked girls up until now but he is more than willing to make it work with Takumi. Even if not, he's still perfectly fine with just being best bros with Takumi, even going as far as stating that he doesn't care for the rest of humanity like Takumi.
Sirei catches Gaku breaking the rules by coming into Takumi's room like that, and uses his drones to take him away.

Nozomi comes to Takumi's room and tells him that she talked to Yugamu about things and learned the truth. Takumi tries to explain to Nozomi why he's doing this, but she says it seems like he's doing this for his own benefit, but that she will continue to keep an eye on him to prevent him from going down the wrong path.
Battle against Squad 3.
Addamaque is affected by the pheromones, and is ok with dying here as long as it helps Takumi, stating that Takumi should kill and consume him.
Sirei announces Kurara as the winner of this time's Takumi award time.

Kurara arrives, maskless, at Takumi's room for her Takumi award time. She mentions that Sirei said she is allowed to share a bed with Takumi and tell him how much she loves him. Which she does, and says that Takumi can touch her more when cuddling, to which Takumi replies that this is strictly a sleeping arrangement. She even offers kingship to him via marrying into the Oosuzuki family. Takumi replies that he was thinking of something less restrictive, to which Kurara replies that she doesn't need her family, and then asks Takumi how many children she wants. She also states that Takumi is her reason for fighting now.
Takumi wakes up next to Kurara, who asks to keep this between them. Then asks if next time they can do this without clothes.
Yugamu informs Takumi that the drugs have worn off via his scent. However, the pheromones are still active and it appears Takumi is still producing them on his own now.

Eito renters the academy grounds to speak with Takumi. He says he's back to patch things up with Takumi, and reveals his gift: 4 severed heads of commanders, all the remaining commanders (excepting V'ehxness). Even Eito is in love with Takumi and wants to reconcile. Even if Takumi hates him he still wants to be of some use, he doesn't even care about humanity anymore, only wanting to serve Takumi.
Takumi goes to the cafeteria, where Eito has prepared everyone sandwiches for breakfast, although everyone except Takumi looks like monsters to him still.

Eito ordered Eva to make a huge scene in her cage so that Sirei and Nigou would be busy with it. Eito uses this time to reveal that this is the planet Futurum not Earth, that humanity are the invaders, that the LDA is a weapon used to take over the planet and wipe out all life on it.

Eito AND NOZOMI elected to up the frequency and quality of the Takumi time awards in order to keep everyone motivated. Which the SDU agreed with naturally. Eito to remain impartial, and because Takumi still isn't the bigest fan of him, is not assigning any awards to himself. He then instantly gives out the award of an oil massage to Hiruko.

Takumi goes to Hiruko's room in order to get the oil massage thta she was rewarded with. She also requests that Takumi changes into a swimsuit, but says that she's ok with full nudity, and she also preps to change, unless Takumi also wants her fully nude (he doesn't). Takumi exits the shower from changing with his eyes shut tight. Hiruko gets him to lie down on the bed and starts the massage, specifically throwing in many innuendos about Takumi being all wet from her touch, or all slippery, etc. She also comments on how sensitive Takumi's body is and how stiff he was before and how he's like putty in her hands now.
Takumi wakes up the next morning in Hiruko's room, then leaves for the cafeteria.
Eito announces the next Takumi award time and the winner: a nude hangout at the sauna with Shouma. Eito reveals that he modified a shed within the Wall of Fire to act as a sauna.

Takumi and Shouma sweat it out in the sauna, where Shouma instantly becomes ripped and offers to let Takumi touch him. Shouma challenges him to see who can last the longest in the sauna, as he is getting notably weaker and his voice decaying. They both stay in for a long while, getting much much worse and having their speech decay so much. Eventually they made it out of there, after 5 rounds interspersed with open air baths. Takumi won at a 3:2 ratio. Again Shouma says that following Takumi is his own reason for living.

Takumi wakes up to the morning announcement, then is immediately hit with Eito and Kyoshika coming into his room for the next reward. They then move to Kyoshika's room so they don't make a mess in Takumi's room. This time the Takumi time award: washing him in the shower room. Kyoshika directly asks Takumi if she can "touch herself under the waist with the Holy Jumonji Sword" while she washes his back, Takumi does not answer. sword_fucker.png. Kyoshika asks to wash Takumi's front after she finishes washing his back, Takumi refuses. She makes it clear that she wants Takumi to see her naked. She did have the Holy Jumonji Sword present the whole time.
Defensive battle (Squadless).

Takumi wakes up to the morning announcement and is instantly met with Eito and Moko for the next Takumi award time. This time Takumi gets to spar against her. Takumi spends multiple hours being beaten in wrestling matches and moves. Takumi screams that he can not take it, and Moko says that her love for him is so strong she can't stop herself. Takumi spends multiple hours like this.

Sirei comes to see Takumi in his room and says he's worried about the way everyone is acting and that this has basically turned into a cult. He then reveals that the SDU was literally created and born to fight. Sirei then pretends to power down and knocks Takumi out.

Takumi wakes up the next morning to Eito in his room taking care of him. Eito informs him that he was keeping watch over him after he saw Sirei head to his room, and got Eva to deal with Sirei so as to avoid the bomb problem. He then tells Takumi to head to the cafeteria. Takumi on the way over, runs into Nigou who asks if he has seen Sirei, as Nigou hasn't seen him since last night. Takumi enters the caf to everyone asking him if he's ok and why he got attacked. Eito pushes that aside in order to establish a new system of protection, with Eito as the leader (Takumi is the god figure now).

Eva arrives at Takumi's room after the morning announcement and states that she is here for her reward after dealing with Sirei (and that Eito is taking care of "the remains"). She states that the reward is that she gets to treat Takumi to a cake made from scratch. She asks Takumi to wait outside until she is finished. Upon Takumi reentering the room, he finds Eva naked, on his bed, with whipped cream and strawberries coverring various parts of her body (including her knee). Takumi is freaked the fuck out by this. Eva specifically says he has to eat all of it, or else Eva can not move. She forgot the spoon so Takumi has to use his mouth, as eating with his hands would be rude. Takumi mentally forces himself to envision and think about Eva as a cake. By the time Takumi finishes it is already night time, so Takumi goes right to bed.

Eito asks Takumi to head to the cafeteria, whereupon arriving he is informed that Sirei is missing. Eito then elaborates that Eito had Eva destroy Sirei and then dispose of the pieces via throwing them through the Wall of Fire. This was done because of Sirei attacking and planning to brainwash Takumi. Further he states that they have negotiated with Nigou and that Nigou has sworn loyalty to Takumi. Nozomi says that she thinks things are going too far, and asks the SDU if they would fight against humanity. Everyone else states that they in fact would.

Shion comes to see Takumi about Sirei's death, Takumi states that there was nothing he could do and that it had to happen. When Shion pushes back and says that everyone is fully devoted to him, Takumi replies "another critic huh" and asks if Shion is jealous of him for having friends, then dismisses him.
Defensive battle (Squadless).
Ima and Kako are selected for the next Takumi award time for tomorrow.

Ima and Kako get Takumi to perform the "Kako Festival" with them wherein Ima and Takumi carry Kako as a divine palaquin. Everyone is down to just simple underwear. Ima is happy to see his sister get so excited to be picked up by Takumi, Kako says that she needs to be handled gently or else she will go wild. The festival lasts all day until nighttime.

Nozomi asks Takumi to meet her in one of the classrooms to discuss something. She brings up that she doesn't like what's happening and that she thinks things are spiralling out of control and could get much worse. She suggests having Yugamu make a drug to counteract the pheremones Takumi is producing. Then Eito steps in and reveals he was listening in and calls Nozomi a traitor, leaving the choice of picking between him and Nozomi in Takumi's hands. Nozomi asks him to stop this and reverse the effects, while Eito says he loves Takumi and will not stand for that.

Takumi flatly rejects Nozomi's proposal, and says she might not stay with the SDU after this. She leaves to go think about everything that has happened and about her decisions. Eito thanks Takumi for his choice.

Eva comes to Takumi's room with breakfast, informing him that the others are busy discussing battle plans and ideas. As he goes to get up and leave, Eva says there's more. The power cuts for a bit and everything goes dark, and when it comes back on Eva is once again covered in whipped cream and strawberries. Takumi fully goes into it this time, ordering Eva to not move or make noises as she's supposed to be a cake. She does explicitly state that the way Takumi uses his tongue is "godly".

Takumi enters the cafeteria and notices Nozomi is present, and asks her why she's here. She replies that she's a member of the SDU so of course she should be here. When Takumi points this out and how odd it is, Takumi asks her to be honest and open with him. To which she replies that she is fully in love with Takumi and that she loves him so much it hurts. Takumi asks Eito if he did anything, to which Eito informs Takumi that he brainwashed Nozomi. When Takumi starts protesting against this, everyone says that they came to this decision unanimously. They put Yugamu in charge of the process, to great success. Takumi internally decides that this is ok and that this is what needs to be done to keep everyone alive and safe, and that as the one with this power he must wield and use it.

Yugamu arrives at Takumi's room to get his reward time, and asks Takumi to drop by the biolab for it after he is informed dissections are not allowed. When Takumi arrives Yugamu informs Takumi he can just watch, as he starts carving into himself. Yugamu is so excited that Takumi doesn't even want to look at it. He then mentions that he's so excited that "it's coming out from inside" of him. He further notes that he is so turned on and that he can't stop. Takumi tasks him to stop it, and "put it back in". Yugamu replies it keeps spilling, that it hurts, but that he's never felt like this before. He then says that it "hurts so good". After witnessing this Takumi goes back to his room, and goes to bed since it was night time.
Battle against V'ehxness' Squad.

V'ehxness enters the battlefield, and claims that Takumi now belongs to her as she desires his greatness. She disregards the entire war, and that once she has Takumi she won't need anything else. She also reveals that her feelings have been growing since she checked in on them, but that she didn't want to admit it until now. Now she is certain, that she loves Takumi, however she wants him and only him and she will take him for herself. She then states that the two of them rule as the gods of this world. Naturally the SDU disagrees, and so begins the battle against her.
After being defeated V'ehxness begs for at least Takumi to take her as his own, when he refuses she asks for a favour: for Takumi to live a happy life. She is then executed and absorbed.

The SDU gathers on the school yard after to discuss what has happened and what the next steps will be. He ponders if they should go through with the plan and launch the missiles, but says he will decide later. He then selects Nozomi as the next Takumi award time winner and asks her to come to his room later.

Nozomi arrives at Takumi's room and moments after entering, Takumi pulls her into a hug and asks her to call him "Takky". Sheag agrees to, and then Takumi pulls her down onto the mattress. The next scene is of them both naked sitting next to each other in bed. Nozomi asks if Takumi is happy with her, and he says he is. To which she replies that she is since she really loves him. Takumi then says he loves her, and has loved her since before even coming here.

Takumi meets with the SDU in the yard, and lists his plan: to launch the pod to the artifical satellite before the 100 days are up, with their infusers, and then force the people who built the LDA to return with them and disable the missiles. Then Takumi will rule over the planet and both races, forcing them to coexist in peace. Takumi asks if everyone will join him, and the SDU agrees. Nigou doesn't like the idea but says he has no other choice. The new mission starts: appoint Takumi as the ruler of everything.

A few weeks after, the SDU arrives on the Artifical Satellite, in class armour. Takumi says that he has no regrets and that this is his duty. He states he will lead everyone, and rule over this planet as a god. He doesn't even need Karua as he has Nozomi.

route.name: 042: Cult of Takumi Route: Living Idol

events.name: Takumi sides with Nozomi and elects to try and stop the pheromones. Eito accepts this, but tells Takumi he should return to his room and he and Nozomi will go inform Yugamu.

Nozomi arrives at Takumi's room to inform him the drug is finished and that everyone want sto be there as he takes it, so he heads for the caf. Yugamu gives Takumi the drug, which he takes. Moments after taking the drug, Takumi finds himself paralyzed. Yugamu reveals that it was a drug that shuts out all signals to the brain, and that the SDU came to a unanimous decision to do this. They would rather do this than go back to what their lives were like before. The SDU informs him that will be worshipped as a god, and that they will always take care of him and keep him alive. Eito then states that all that remains to do is get rid of Nozomi. The SDU beats Nozomi to death, as a group, one strike at a time, one member at a time, in cycles. After this the scene cuts to a naked Takumi on a bed with a naked Eito over him telling him that he did nothing wrong, and they'll prove it to him. Eito informs him that he will become the God of humanity and that all will bow down to him. Eito also says that he got a special reward at everyone's behest, and that he gets to spend time with Takumi as he pleases. Eito then states that he's never done anything like this, as he's never been able to feel like this towards another human or want one like this. After this Takumi gives up on feeling, forced to watch over humanity as an object.

Tsubasa falters when attempting to blow up the bomb and fails to detonate it. V'ehxness informs Tsubasa that she will be saved for last in the death cycle. Everyone else rushes out and prepares to face her head on no matter what. The battle begins again.

V'ehxness defeats the SDU and takes them prisoner, as Zen'ta informs her they have seized the Revive-O-Matic. V'ehxness then begins to interrogate Takumi, saying that if he tells her everything she will take him as a slave and keep him as a pet. Takumi asks who would ever want to belong to her.
V'ehxness wakes Takumi up and informs him that he will be kept alive, at least until she can figure out everything in the school and humanity's plans.
Meanwhile, Takemaru is being kicked around by Addamaque as Tsubasa shows Eva around the school.

Takumi wakes up on day 17, to see Tsubasa bringing him food. She then goes to all the other SDU members and delivers them food. Gaku asks her why she's the only one not chained up, which she dodges the question of.

Tsubasa delivers food again, asks Takumi if he thinks she's a traitor, and he says no and that what happened happened. Tsubasa says he could have picked any of the others instead. V'ehxness enters the leisure lounge to rub in Takumi's mistakes.

After being fed by Tsubasa, V'ehxness brings Takumi a chair and plays a game with him: each time Takumi answers a question she will answer one of his. The catch is that she will tell one and only one lie throughout and that Takumi must guess it, if he does she will remove his shackles. Takumi asks if she has any family, she answers that she has a younger sister who's in charge of watching over Tsubasa, and that her parents are dead. V'ehxness asks what Takumi feels when he absorbs someone's power, he answers that he got stronger. V'ehxness reveals that the taboo against cannabalism was enstated in order to prevent self-sacrifice. V'ehxness asks what Takumi felt when he killed their heroes, if he ever considered their lives. Takumi can't even answer as he goes through the implications of them having lives and wills of their own. V'ehxness says that she is having a lot of fun with Takumi. Quenzelle runs in and informs V'ehxness that they found the device housing the Second Coming. She then leaves to handle that and tells Takumi they will resume tomorrow.

V'ehxness once again comes to visit Takumi, this time with blood on her hands. She reveals she was torturing someone, Takumi asks who, she says she didn't bother asks for a name. She then highlights that Takumi's concern seems more personal, and asks if he has someone he is partial to. Takumi's reaction gives her the answer yes. She then says the blood is annoying her, and strips to go swimming in the pool, fully nude. She asks if Takumi wants to swim as well, and that she can remove his chains to do so and that she will not drown him. He passes. She explains that the ability for the SDU to come back to life is a weakness as they are not truly fighting in a way that can be a sacrifice. She gets out of the water and puts her clothes back on. Takumi's first question to her is who she was talking about when she said a man once looked at her with the same look as him. She reveals that it was the man who raised her, and that he looked at her after defeating Dahl'xia. V'ehxness asks if Takumi felt iolated from his friends due to his coming back in time and knowing things they couldn't. V'ehxness then ends the game there and leaves.

After this Nigou slides a tile to the side and comes up from the floor to talk to Takumi, revealing that Sirei hid him away in case something happened. He then says they took apart Sirei and trying to get info out of his body. Nigou asks Takumi to cozy up to V'ehxness and to assassinate her. Takumi says he will do his best. Nigou goes back into hiding to try and figure out a way to get everyone out of there.
Addamaque reveals that he is going to go back to their main base, and break Dahl'xia out of his cage and try to have him defeat V'ehxness.

V'ehxness visits Takumi again, and asks why he will not eat. He says that her staring freaks him out and she doesn't understand why. V'ehxness then continues the game. Takumi asks what the paragon titles mean, she replies that it is based on what the Oracle names them based on their qualities. V'ehxness asks Takumi what hope is, Takumi answers that it is the will to keep moving towards the future. Takumi asks her what hope is, and she says to make the impossible possible. V'ehxness tells Takumi that he also has this determination, that he made the impossible possible by turning back time, consuming his own life to become hope for his team.
