V'ehxness ends their game there, and Takumi retorts that he is about used to the chains anyways. V'ehxness asks him for his name, as she has decided that he is worth being called by his name.

Addamaque catches Tsubasa looking for something in the weapons room, and pins her against the wall and asks her if they are s till capable of fighting. That if given weapons would they fight. Tsubasa replies that they would. Addamaque reveals his plan to kill V'ehxness, in full detail. He asks Tsubasa to get the SDU to join with him as it would take down V'ehxness.
Nigou visits Takumi during the night to inform him of the planned coup, and that the coup will catch her off guard and give Takumi a chance to assassinate her.

Takumi wakes up to a rumbling noise, and opens his eyes to V'ehxness sitting on a sitting in front of him, with candles in front of her. She says she had been reading about human culture, and learned that humans sleep on beds. So she brought Takumi a bed he could sleep on for tonight. Takumi sits down on the bed next to V'ehxness, after which she stands up. She then says that she hardly ever sleeps, ever since becoming Supreme Commander. She begins the game and asks Takumi if he would serve her, become one of her subordinates. Takumi asks for a question before answering, so he asks if it is possible for them to coexist. V'ehxness answers no, only saying that Takumi may live. When V'ehxness asks him again to join, Takumi moves back to the floor and says that he will not. V'ehxness gives him the bed anyways, and continues watching Takumi until he falls asleep.
Addamaque once against talks to Tsubasa, informing her the plan is going forward. Telling her to get the weapons and get them to everyone for when the fight starts.
Nigou delivers Takumi's infuser to him, along with the key to his shackles. Then informs him the coup happens tomorrow and that's when he will have to kill V'ehxness.

V'ehxness brings Takumi another chair, and spends a lot of time staring at Takumi. Before finally saying that this place relaxes her. Takumi manages to ask one question: if she has told her lie yet. She answers no. Then Takumi and V'ehxness feel a shock, which she reveals is Dahl'xia coming to the acaemy. As this occurs, Tsubasa and Gaku deliver everyone's infusers to them as they prepare to fight.

Meanwhile, the commanders discuss events. Addamque tells Quenzelle he can leave, but Quenzelle reveals that he is siding with V'ehxness. As that occurs Dahl'xia arrives and states that he will not allow any deaths but that he will show no mercy.
V'ehxness informs Takumi that she is certain of victory, that she will defeat everyone and consume them. She turns her back to Takumi and prepares.

branch.name: How Will You Deal With V'ehxness?

route.name: 043: V'ehxness Route: Making the Impossible Possible

events.name: Takumi transformers into his class armour, then stabs V'ehxness in the back, attempting to kill and absorb her cryptoglobin. V'ehxness reveals that this is exactly what she anticipated, and thanks Takumi. She reveals that her strength isolated her as no one was ever willing to challenge her, making Takumi her much needed hope. She also reveals the lie was that she did not kill her father. However she still believed in the commandments due to him, but Takumi, godless and unafraid, was the one who shattered those. She then proceeds to chain Takumi by his neck and drag him around with her, forcing him to witness her ascent to godhood. However, even throughout this, V'ehxness didn't absorb any cryptogloblin. Finally V'ehxness and Dahl'xia meet in the gym, as Dahl'xia reveals that he did not absorb the Second Coming. Dahl'xia is easily defeated by her, Takumi asks her to kill Dahl'xia rather than torture him. In response V'ehxness reveals that she didn't aborb any cryptoglobin in order to have Takumi take it and become powerful enough to properly battle her. She sets him free so he can do this. Takumi then absorb everyone's cryptoglobin, and prepares to kill V'ehxness. They meet in the school's yard and prepare to fight.

Takumi and V'ehxness fought for four days, and after defeating Takumi she rested for two days. After this Nyewgank informs her of the timespan and asks if he will be punished for his survivial. V'ehxness allows him to leave with his life. She also states she has never been this happy before and that she likely never will be again. Afterwards, she stands in the defense room and prepares to absorb the Second Coming. Although she knows that she will never stand shoulder-to-shoulder with anyone again now that Takumi is dead. She thanks Takumi one last time.

Takumi attempts to talk V'ehxness out of murdering everyone. Starting by informing her that if she kills everyone there will be none left to worship her. She mentions its a good attempt but that it will not work on her, that she knows her own greatness and doesn't need anyone else but Takumi. She then slashes Takumi's leg, mentioning cowardly tricks don't impress her, reveals that the lie was that she killed her father. She then orders to Takumi to wait for her to return. Meanwhile the SDU heads towards the Defense Room as Tsubasa stays to go get Takumi. Addamaque runs into her and tells her to go to Dahl'xia, and asks her to consume his power. After a brief bonding moment, she does so. Back to Takumi, Turamtammi runs into the leisure lounge and confronts Takumi, saying that ever since V'ehxness started talking to him she's been losing it. She proceeds to attempt to murder Takumi, but V'ehxness interrupts, taking a deep wound to save Takumi, and then kills and absorbs Turamtammi. Hiruko then enters, deals a blow to V'ehxness, and orders Takumi to kill V'ehxness. Takumi asks V'ehxness if she's ok, and chooses to save her. Saying he's just returning the favour of her saving him. V'ehxness protests, saying this is best opportunity. Takumi retorts that he still isn't done trying to make her see things his way, and that if she really wanted to kill him she would have done it already. Tsubasa then arrives, and stabs both Takumi and V'ehxness, saying she had to kill both in order to win. Takumi blacked out, only able to hear that V'ehxness yelled that she wouldn't let anyone else take Takumi and escaped with him.

Later, in the woods somewhere, Takumi wakes up next to a fallen V'ehxness, both of them bleeding out, holding hands. She asks if he regrets the way things turned, Takumi says he is unsure, and asks her. She says she regrets nothing, and that she did as she pleased. She reveals that she spent much time here as a child, with her sister and her father.
Kyoshika detonates the undying flame bomb, sacrificing herself to take out V'ehxness.
Ghost Boy appears to Takumi to try to cheer him up and give his condolences.
Maskless Kurara approaches Nozomi in the cafeteria to make up with her, in accordance with Kyoshika's last wish.

Nozomi reveals Moko has been missing since last night, Takumi takes the branch campus students on an exploration to search for her, they find her and bring her back, where she reveals that went back to retireve the Holy Jumonji Sword's Pajamas.

Takumi discusses the idea of giving Ghost Boy a name with Sirei, but Sirei firmly rejects the idea. He says the SDU should not get attached to him as he is a weapon and nothing more, reminding Takumi that he does still have a bomb planted in him if he starts getting ideas.
Battle against Squad 6.

Takumi elects to kill Eva, to the disagreement of several SDU members. However before they do, Eva shouts that she knows where a Box of Blessings is, which is a mystical artifiact with a spirit inside, that if all 7 are collected you get any wish granted. Eva, who apparantly can't lie once her mask is off, says it really exists and she knows where it is. Eva refuses to tell them anything unless they promise not to kill her. Eva reveals that the box had what appeared to be a moon design on it. Kako upon hearing this, kills and absorbs Eva. However shortly after in Eva's voice they hear "pay for this, you'll pay for this! I didn't want to die, I shouldn't have died!" and curses the SDU. Yugamu then throws her corpse into the undying flames.

Takumi wakes up from a nightmare of hearing Eva's voice, then hears Kako and Ima arguing. With Kako saying she's now stronger than Ima and that he is no longer qualified to protect her, she then runs off. Upon entering the cafeteria, Gaku reveals that almost everyone had a nightmare about Eva last night and overslept. During a conversation about the possible existence of a box, they hear a large rumbling. In the hallway they find Tsubasa who reveals that all the shelves in the garage collapsed. Takumi runs into Nozomi in the cafeteria who after last night and Takumi's decision, needs to stay away from him for a bit. Several of the SDU then gather to clean up the garage, working until night time. Takumi goes to the cafeteria to get them some food, but finds the lights flickering, then sees a ghost or similar in the corner. Just then Ima walks in, the ghost vanishes, and reveals that Kako left the school to go get stronger. Takumi has to decide to look for Kako or the Shadowy Figure he saw.

Takumi decides to ignore the shadowy figure and go looking for Kako, he gathers everyone in the cafeteria. Sirei says some have to stay behind to guard the academy. Kurara, Ima, Gaku, Yugamu, Nozomi, and Hiruko go to look. Within some ruins outside they find her, however she says she can feel a box of blessings hidden in a nearby shrine. However before they can go to it, invaders show up forcing them to retreat back for now.

In the morning much of the SDU sets out, and by afternoon they reach the shrine. However they find the box missing. Once more they hear footsteps and retreat to the school. At night, Hiruko enters Takumi's room and says they should get serious about finding the boxes, and if they don't they will be led down a path of self destruction. She leaves to inform the others.

The SDU looks for the boxes over a few days. On the day of the 26th, Nozomi alerts the group and they follow a shadow they saw. They catch up to it and find an old man. Upon talking to him he asks if they are Children of the Stars, the SDU doesn't know what that means, but promises to leave him alone if he tells them what he knows. He then tells them that is part of a group that has eschewed the war with the Children of the Stars and returned to their home, he then says that this planet is Futurum, and that it is not Earth, further he informs them that the first Children of the Stars descended and scorched the planet, trying to take the planet. Right after that, a Box of Blessing appeared. He mentions the boxes of blessing and calamity, and that V'ehxness as the current Supreme Commander and keeper of cryptoglobin she is the keeper of the boxes. The Boxes of Blessings grant any wish, while the Boxes of Calamity bring untold disaster. He says that some even say that the boxes are how God granted them cryptoglobin in the first place, and if that's true the boxes really are the start of it all. However through the years, the boxes' precise locations were lost, and became more of an ideal, a symbol of the Supreme Commander's authority. However, Supreme Commander V'ehxness has been seeking their power once more as the war came. Further, he also says he had a friend researching the boxes before the war, and there might be some results left around here somewhere. The SDU regroups at the academy, Takumi asks Sirei about this not being Earth. After some threats they get the truth out of Sirei, that humanity left Earth after World Death via the Exodus Project, and that the Artifical Satellite is a space ship. Before leaving they had discovered a planet, KXK-787, that in many ways was Earth's long list sister, located in a habitable space, with most of the planet covered in water. Also that the Tokoyo Residental Complex is inside the satellite. However their goal remains the same: defeat the Futurans and give humanity a new home.

The SDU finds some kind of shelter in the ruins that they enter, assuming it must be the ruins the old man mentioned. They find a scroll inside, and head back outside. After exiting however, Quenzelle appears, and rips the scroll in half, taking one side and leaving.
Several days pass, although the SDU is able to make it away from the area despite being attacked by Addamaque. The SDU discusses what to do now.
The SDU heads out to look for a commander base, but is unable to find anything.

The SDU once again goes out to look for a commander base, this time however they do find it. They decide to scout it out and come back tomorrow. The next day they come back and send a strike team down, consisting of Takumi, Takemaru, Kurara, Yugamu, and Hiruko. Quenzelle appears, saying he will take back the SDU's half of the moldy book/scroll. The SDU defeats and absorbs him. They find the other half of the book/scroll, and a box of blessings. They decide to put off opening the box until they have more info and possibly all of the boxes.

The SDU decides to go see the old man again, to try and get him to translate the language so they can learn what the book says. They give him and his group food and water in exchange. He reveals that this area was once known as the Land of the Royal Tomb, the land where a former supreme commander sealed the sealed. Thirteen boxes lay dormant in the Land of the Royal Tomb, 7 of Blessing, 6 of Calamity. The ability to distinguish the two has been lost over time, due to the Supreme Commander's insistence on oral tradition. Only one sentence remains "Blessings stand alone". As such they have no idea what box they have, and no clue where the boxes are other than somewhere in this area. The SDU comes up with the idea of creating a scanner for the boxes and attaching it to the academy's main computer.

Gaku comes to Takumi's room to inform him they need θ4 and λ7 in order to complete the analysis machine, so they set out on an exploration to find them. Which they do, and hand them over to Tsubasa. The next morning she completes the machine, and they turn it on. 13 locations appear, likely the boxes locations. The SDU decides to split into teams, one to search, one to defend, with Takumi getting to pick where he goes.
Takumi elects to go with the exploration group and search for the boxes.

The exploration group of Gaku, Hiruko, Ima, Kako, Tsubasa, and Takumi set out to begin looking for boxes. They reach the first location, the beach, and look for a shrine underneath the sand. During searching Gaku starts to fall into a sand pit, however as Tsubasa starts falling, they realize its some kind of cave and that Gaku is in fact not dying. Further, they also find a box in it, this one has 10, compared to the previous which had 4.

Takumi wakes up to an attack from Turamtammi's squad, however the music is already playing, so they are able to avoid the full illusion. Part way through the battle Nyewgank appears and revives Turamtammi, however the SDU is able to defeat and absorb both.

The group heads back out once again to search for boxes, a hospital and an art gallery. They head for the hospital first. Inside, Gaku tries to flip a light switch and has a light fall on him. They then find box 6, and head back to the academy.
The SDU spends several days looking for boxes, finding nothing.

The group sets out to explore and makes it to the art gallery. Takumi and Hiruko end up looking at a painting of a cherry blossom viewing party, and they discuss the nature of war. However, after asking about the box's location and Takumi saying the other one was back at the academy, she tries to stab Takumi. The real Hiruko shows up and pushes Takumi aside revealing that it was Zen'ta, who took the box and left. However the real Hiruko is wounded, with a slash on her stomach.

Takumi wakes up to an attack by Zen'ta's squad, who is transformed into Hiruko. After splitting into multiple copies, and then copying the other SDU members, the SDU is able to defeat and absorb her. Further they also retrieve box 12 from Zen'ta, the same one from the art gallery.

The group heads out again, this time having to camp out to make it to their destination. Takumi and Gaku get the job of taking watch, they have a conversation about confidence and being one's self. The next morning they decide to head back to the academy since they had scoped the area out.

The group heads out, their destination is Turamtammi's house, as there should be a box there. They find her house and enter, however Tsubasa almost falls into a spike trap, Takumi grabs her and prevents her. Just then, Turamtammi's voice plays over a speaker saying they weren't invited and deserve a trap extravaganza. They manage to avoid the traps, and grab box 9 and head back.
Takumi wakes up to an attack without a leader, the SDU defeats them.

Takumi wakes up to Shouma informing him Eito has escaped. They head to the courtyard to investigate and find that he is just gone. They suspect he got into the research lab, and may now have data to be able to get the remaining boxes. They also find Sirei's body torn apart and dumped in a trash can, with possible motives of wanting information from him, wanting to prevent him from telling us something, both, or something else. The SDU searches the school but finds nothing. They do find missing supplies and a fire extingisher, meaning he likely left. Takumi gets to decide if he goes with the split girls team or boys team for exploration.
Takumi decides to go with the girls' team, with Yugamu and Takemaru being used to fill out the boys' team.
The groups set out, the girls' group heading towards and finding a mansion. Within they find invaders, and try to sneak around. They find box 11 without issue, and leave.
The groups leave again, this time the girls' group sees a wave of invaders heading towards the school and heads back to defend.

Takumi wakes up to an attack, afterwards V'ehxness projects a hologram to speak to them with. She asks if we devoured Eva, but doesn't really care. She also asks for the boxes, in exchange she'll grant them a quick and painless death, the SDU refuses and she says she'll enjoy tearing them apart. She disconnects the hologram and a second wave attacks. The SDU defeats them, once again V'ehxness projects a hologram and says she'll take the boxes at the grand finale.
The SDU takes Eva prisoner, putting her in the courtyard cage opposite Eito's.

Takumi starts to talk to Eva asking if there's a way to end the war, to which Eva replies that if there was it would have been done a long time ago. She then asks why they started the war and invaded, leading to Takumi to question what that meant since Eva was an invader. Then Sirei knocks him out with a stun baton.
Takumi wakes up in bed the next day and doesn't recall any of the previous day. As the day occurs Sirei and Nigou and locked in the infmary with Eva.

Ghost Boy appears to Takumi to warn him that Sirei might be doing something that Takumi and the others wouldn't like with Eva, but Takumi dismisses it saying Sirei always has their best interests at heart.

Eito is discovered to have escaped multiple days ago and had disguised the lock to appear intact and bunched up blankets to make it look like he was sleeping. Further one of the fire extinguishers was replaced with a fake.
Nigou sends the non sick DSU members on an expedition to collect ingredients to make a super drug to heal everyone who was out sick.
Everyone except Takumaru, Gaku, and Nozomi is out with the common cold.
Kako has a vision that danger will come to Gaku soon, and that if Gaku dies the group will lose its way.
Eva is introduced as a new transfer student to the SDU, although she seems emotionless, claiming she is the SDU's soldier and property.

Kurara testing this theory asks what would happen if they told her to strip. Which she instantly does, much to the shock of almost everyone (Gaku excepted) involved. Eva then puts her clothes bcak upon being ordered to, and reiterates that she will simply do as ordered.

Hiruko goes to destroy Nigou, but Eva steps in to stop her claiming that Nigou is her friend and she doesn't want him destroyed. Sirei then shows up and reveals what he did was perform "Dolmenic Cognitive Reconstruction Therapy" on her and that he was keeping this hidden in case it distressed her. This process involves rewriting a person's memories and personality, in this case replacing her memories and feelings with hatred for her species and an inability to disobey the SDU.
Battle against Squad 3.
Addamaque highly implies that V'ehxness is still alive and is canabalizing everyone. This is instantly followed by V'ehxness appearing and canabalizing him.
Battle against V'ehxness.

Ghost boy strikes out and launches himself as undying flame at V'ehxness, knocking her out of her transformation and unconscious. Then her soldiers grab Gaku and Kurara as she vanishes, forcing the SDU to pick one to save.
Kurara is killed and absorbed by V'ehxness.
Takumi enters the cafeteria to find that Sirei has served everyone a mysterious green drink that is having intoxicating effects on them.
Takumi enters the caf to find only Hiruko, Eva, and Nigou, with Hiruko acting odd and unable to remember the story of why she fought invaders or that she thought Takumi was acting strange before.
Takumi, Eva, and Hiruko are tasked with finding the materials to make an astronomical telescope to cheer Nozomi up.

Nozomi begins suffering rejection symptoms. Takumi attempts to rally the SDU to go out to get cryptoglobin for Nozomi, Sirei attempts to override him, even going as far as mentioning being his commanding officer. This causes Takumi's brain to go fuzzy and for him to start to agree with Sirei, until he remembers that he came back to save Nozomi and fights past it, saying he would go alone. The rest of the SDU says they will go with him, so they form a group of Takumi, Yugamu, Moko, Nozomi, Takemaru, and Nigou to set out to find a commander.
The split group arrives at an invader base and begins a battle against Squad 4.

Takumi and Nozomi discuss the past and the previous loop, Takumi reveals most of what he knows about Nozomi and Karua, and they get along well. Then Nozomi reveals that her mother also died in the car crash and it was her uncle doing cryptoglobin research, a stark difference to route 0's story of Nozomi's mother.

Sirei enters Takumi's room to ask him if he thinks Nozomi can fight. Takumi then goes to ask if Sirei can brainwash the members of the team like he did Eva, Sirei says he would never do something and says that the differing pasts might be because this is a parallel world. Sirei then pretends to run out of power, and knocks Takumi out with a stun baton as soon as his back is turned.
Takumi wakes up on day 43, heads right to the cafeteria, and is informed he was out all yesterday, much to his shock as he can't recall anything after talking to Nozomi.

Kako makes a dish so terrible that its fed to Eva who proceeds to have a breakdown, seeming to regain parts of her memory and begging her sister for forgiveness. Sirei then arrives and knocks her out with a stun baton.

Takumi takes Eva to the infirmary, wherein he witnesses the process of brainwashing her as she was likely to break free. Sirei reveals that personality is very much dependent on memory, and as such removing memory will alter personality, so you have to guess and check until you get a working personality. Sirei then makes Takumi do it, via spinning a roulette wheel and using that to adjust her personality, to very weird results. Whereupon the power blacks out for a little bit, and Sirei reveals that's a side effect of the machine and how much power it draws and as such can't be used again until tomorrow.

After 2 more days of brainwashing, Takumi fails to give her a good personality, at which point Sirei decides to kill her. Suddently she actually snaps back to the personality and memories she had before eating Kako's cooking.
The morning annoucement bugs out, gets distorted, as does the world around Takumi as he heads to the caf.

Upon entering the caf Takumi finds himself back in the visual novel style world that was part of Squad 11's tactic in route 0. Although this version is much more distored, including every character in the SDU (including Nigou who is their teacher, and Eva who is a new transfer alien) excepting Sirei and Eito, Hiruko seems to notice we've done this before but loses the though before being able to break out. Naturally all hell breaks loose moments after this as everyone's backstories and personalities start colliding in increasingly bizzare ways. Finally the Ghost notices how long the alarms have been going off and decides to look around himself, going to find Takumi as he's the most likely to be able to solve this. Along the way he finds many SDU members with blank expressions and no movement, before finally getting dragged into the illusion himself. Wherein he discovers he beat Eva at tag in order to save the Earth from destruction. However, the Ghost still remains aware that this is an illusion, and almost gives into it as its better than a life in the machine. He then lights Takumi on fire again.
Battle against Squad 11.
Squad 10 joins the battle.
Eito joins the war on the invaders, on the side of the invaders, against the SDU. Joining the battle after Squad 10 is defeated.
Eito absorbs both commanders, and leaves to go be absorbed by V'ehxness to heal her wounds.

Tsubasa and Takemaru discuss memory erasure with Takumi and confirm that they also have missing memories, backed up by Takemaru's journal. They go to see the Ghost about the issue. He shows himself after Takumi nearly incinerates himself on the door of undying flame, appearing and audible to Tsubasa and Takemaru as well. They say that he is their friend and that they want to get to know him, and also ask about Sirei's ability to erase memory. All he can confirm is that Sirei will do anything to save humanity.

Takumi discusses the points of letting the Ghost join the team with the SDU (excepting Eva, and the officers) and they agree. Takumi is tasked with making a gift for Sirei and negotiating with him in order to allow this.
Nigou and Sirei made 50th day badges for the SDU. Nigou reveals that Sirei does love the Ghost boy and views him as a son, even having a childhood photo album of him in his memory banks.
Takumi persuades Sirei to allow the Ghost to join the SDU officially.
Sirei allows the boy to join the SDU on condition of the SDU stops poking into the memory altering issue, Takumi counteroffers so long as stops manipulating their memories, Sirei accepts.

branch.name: Let the Undying Flames Boy Join the Team?

events.name: The SDU discusses naming the Ghost boy, and Sirei instantly suggests Shion, with Nigou revealing he's had it in mind for a while.
Takumi informs Takemaru of the deal, and Takemaru doesn't like it, storming off angerly, and not showing up to next morning's breakfast.

Takumi arrives to find the caf notably empty, and then Gaku comes on the annoucement system, saying he is holding Sirei captive and is going to force him to contact the satellite. Upon arriving in the gym they find Moko, Gaku, and Takemaru acting very strange and demanding Takumi hand over Sirei. They then begin a battle against Takumi, Nozomi, Hiruko, Shouma, and Tsubasa.

After defeating the 3 in battle, Kako and Ima arrive and present the conclusion of Yugamu being the mastermind behind the issue. He did it by developing a drug that he inserted into snacks he gave to the 3, and is now along with Sirei in the war room. Everyone rushes the war room where Yugamu is crucifying Sirei, and reveals he removed the bombs in himself via self-surgery. He also states his plan is to dismember Sirei one-by-one until he sends an emergency signal to the satellite. After its revealed that Sirei can't reach the satellite Yugamu releases him but demands to know exactly why. Sirei reveals that he has been programmed with the Will of Humanity and that for every decision it runs a simulation of the thought process of all human though patterns and can not be overridden. As such he can not contact the satellite since the Will of Humanity has forbidden it.

Battle against Squad 7, with the commander mimicking Eito. Fake Eito states that this war is an invasion led by humanity and that they stole the Second Coming from those that lived here and are using it against them to raze the planet. The real Eito sneaks into the copies, and all of them state that the Earth died a long time ago. After their defeat a fake Eito attempts to kill Sirei but is stopped by Nigou sacrificing himself. Eito then kills and absorbs the commander.

V'ehxness arrives, kills, and absorbs Eito. Shion then launches himself at V'ehxness. V'ehxness then comments at this saying "the Second Coming" has sided with us, and reveals that Eva is her sister. V'ehxness leaves to heal and come back another time, as Eito is revealed to still be alive due to Shion intervention.

Takumi kills Eito with his sword, but as soon as that occurs, Eito's cryptoglobin starts flowing into Takumi, forcing itself into him. The SDU after this, asks Sirei for an explaination about what Eito said and why the commanders call them the invaders.
Takumi in his room, starts having hot flashes and thinking about how ugly and disgusting Eito was, which is why he had to kill him. These thoughts freak him out, but he makes it through it.

Takumi wakes up and heads to the cafeteria, wher ehe is the first one. Moments later, Eito walks in, freaking Takumi out. He screams about, causing others to run in, who are also Eito. For a total of 4 Eitos in the caf.

Takumi, after going to his room and taking a nap, sees Eito sitting on his couch talking to him. Takumi asks if it was a dream, and Eito snaps his fingers, making Takumi wake up. Then after Takumi goes back to sleep again, he's back to seeing and speaking to Eito. Eito reveals that he is now embedded into Takumi, that his consciousness was transfered into him. Eito informs Takumi that he has now developed a cognitive disorder, absorbing Eito's defect causing people to look like him. Eito reveals that he has created an extra Eito in the school with the hemoanima he still has control over. Eito gives Takumi a challenge: find and eliminate the 11th Eito that he made, and he will fade and Takumi's brain will go back to normal. Eito then snaps his fingers, waking Takumi up again, and then Takumi flicks Takumi on the forehead. Eito is able to control parts of Takumi's body and forced him to do that. Eito directly threatens Nozomi, so Takumi takes the challenge. Eito informs Takumi that he will probably be able to take over the body on day 63, giving him until day 62 to come up with an answer, so 4 days total. Eito awakens Takumi again. Takumi begins the hunt.

Takumi goes to speak to an Eito in the leisure lounge, and strikes up a conversation to see if he can find anything. The Eito however replies as the real Eito would, talking about how Takumi really wanted to take his time killing him. He then goes to speak to another Eito in the rec room, who also speaks exactly as the real Eito would. He finds yet another Eito in the infirmary, who also does it. Takumi spends the rest of the day speaking with Eitos, who all speak as if they were Eito.

Takumi comes up with the plan to see if he can tell the Eito's apart by touch. He goes around to every Eito he can find and gives them all sticky notes with a number on them that he has them attach to their chest. After sticking them onto 9 Eitos, he sees that the number is now 1, this occurs after getting a notable headache and getting dizzy. This Eito also says thta now everyone has the number 1 on them, which Takumi confirms. Eito then reveals that he took control of Takumi's body to write 1 on each note and altered his perception so it looked like the correct numbers.

Takumi exits his room in the morning, finds an Eito in the war room, and tries to get him to use his infuser to battle with him. The Eito says he doesn't want to, then 2 more run in to try and stop it. All three of the Eito's then agree to do a battle with him. Takumi plans to use the attack types he recieves to determine who's who, however Eito takes control of his body again in order to block everyone's attacks. This lasts for 30 minutes wherein Eito blocks perfectly the entire time. Eito (brain) compliments Takumi on the idea afterwards, but says he can't allow Takumi to get hurt.

Takumi enters the courtyard and finds that Eva still looks and sounds like Eva, that Eito couldn't modify perception of her. Takumi then explains everything to Eva and has her help him with his task. Right after letting her out of the cage though, Eito uses his body to stab Eva through the back, directly through the heart, killing her with a knife Eito took when Takumi was sleeping. Eito then convinces Takumi to dispose of the body and hide all evidence. Takumi buries her body in a corner of the schoolyard.
Takumi states that there's no eleventh Eito, Eito asks him to confirm that he has lost.

Takumi informs Eito that he has lost. Eito tells him not to insult his intelligence, and that if he had really lost his spirit would have crumbled, but that he can still sense the fight in him. Eito orders Takumi to surrender, to give in to despair. Takumi however realizes that Eito can't take his body unless he gives into the despair and Eito. Takumi then stabs himself in the thigh with the knife that killed Eva. Takumi uses this to deduce that Eito can also feel pain, and uses this to inflict pain onto Eito via killing himself. He reveals his plan and his challenge: kill himself over and over to see if Eito can last through it all, and keep going until Eito fades away. After the first death via stabbing and being brought back by the Revive-O-Matic, Takumi elects to jump off the roof, after that he hangs himself, after that every kind of death he can think of: lighting himself on fire, drowning, taking  poison, anything he can think of. After over 100 iterations of this, some of the other Eitos grab his arm and try to stop him, however he jumps off the roof anyways. They're still there when he revives and says they won't move until he gives them an answer. Takumi in response simply stabs himself and dies that way. Upon waking up again, he stabs himself again, as Eito (brain) informs him that neither of them will last much longer. Several Eitos gather in Takumi's room and try to stop him, they brainstorm what could be happening. They then realize that Takumi absorbed Eito and part of his consciousness, and that he is using the pain of death to wipe out the Eito in his brain. Meanwhile Takumi kills himself via car exhaust. After Takumi wakes up, he walks to the edge of the roof again, but this time sees all the Eitos below cheering him on to not let Eito beat him. Takumi kills himself by jumping in front of them. When he wakes up they're there in his room cheering him on. So the cycle continued, hitting over 500 deaths, before finally passing out. When he wakes up, the SDU is begging him to come back, all of them in their normal bodies, meaning Takumi has won. Gaku reveals Tsubasa threw up every single time Takumi died. However, he stumbles over his words and says "Takumi, I mean I'm back now" and gains a big smile saying "Now that I'm back the fun can really begin".

Takumi informs Eito that he has won, and that Takumi is out of ideas. Eito asks if he's just giving up after sticking to his ideals for so long, he seems very disappointed with this. Eito tells Takumi to stop it and that he didn't want to see him like this, reminding him of what's at stake if he loses. Takumi says he's just going to go to Sirei about it to tell him and have him deal with it. As he prepares to leave, Eito locks his legs. He says that he will not allow his story to end in such a mundane way and that just having Takumi die isn't what he really wanted. Eito then forcefully takes over Takumi's body.

Takumi wakes up in his room the next day, day 63, and tries to figure out what happened and how he's still in control. After washing his face he looks in the mirror and sees Eito staring back at him, as Eito says hello. Eito informs him that what he really wanted was to see Takumi absorbed by despair and himself to taste victory. He then informs Takumi that he power faded and that all he could do was to forever live in Takumi's brain. However, Takumi is still stuck seeing Eito in the mirror as himself. Eito tells him to cheer up as he'll never be alone again.

Takumi determines that the 11th Eito has actually been camped out within Eito's room the whole time as that's within the rules. Takumi rushes into the room, finds Eito there, and kills him. However, after killing him Eito has Takumi look at the note on them whereon the back it says "Come to Eito's room on Day 62. Wait for me inside. I'll explain everything later, but don't tell anyone about this until I do." Another Eito walks in, and Takumi in his rage kills him, as Eito informs him that multiple people were given that note, and he notes that "she" was the first one to show up. Eito forces Takumi to absorb the cryptoglobin of both dead Eitos. Takumi leaves the room, goes to the caf, sees three Eitos, and kills and absorbs all of them in his class armour. Neither of those Eitos were fake, as were any of the others he killed throughout the day.

Takumi fully gives into his hatred, he kills the Eito in front of him, swinging until he can't feel anything anymore. He then enters the Defense Room, kills Sirei, gets blown up, and then reenters the Defense Room. He searches for the last Eito,

route.name: 012: Multiple Eitos Route: A Tragic End

events.name: Takumi rejects the hate he is feeling, and stabs himself. He then shouts that the 11th Eito is real, and its in his head, so that the only way to defeat him is to be killed himself. But he doesn't have to do it, the surviving members of the SDU walk in and Takumi asks them to kill him. They agree to with sorrow, and share the killing blow.

Eito reveals that humanity started this war and that this is not Earth. That the SDU was taken from the TRC but were not put on Earth, instead on this planet. Eito states what he has learned from the invaders and their books: that humanity ruined their own planet, moved to underground shelters, and then left Earth to find a new planet. Sirei then takes over and explains that humanity developed the Exodus Project, a spaceship capable of moving at warp speed, the Artifical Satellite, and found a new planet: KXK-787. Located in a habitable zone that allowed for organic life, with most of the surface covered in water, a perfect match for humanity, a new planet in a galaxy far from Earth. Further its revealed that the TRC is inside the Artifical Satellite. Finally humanity arrived at the planet to find it occupied by intelligent life, filled with people born with cryptoglobin, seen as God's chosen by their culture. Humanity attempted to communicate but it broke down into conflict, with humanity unable to gain any upper hand due to cryptoglobin. Further, humanity's birthrate has been declining, so they need to take the planet or else it will die out. Sirei states that Last Defense Academy is a special spaceship deployed by the Artifical Satellite, while the SDU was onboard, and then had it surrounded by undying flames powered by Shion, and that the reason it is a school is because it fulfilled Shion's wish of being able to go to school like a normal child. Before this however, humanity started to research cryptoglobin themselves, around this time a being was born on the planet with near unlimited power, known to the Futurians (the denizens of the planet) as the Second Coming, this was Shion. Shion was stolen by humanity and likely accelerated cryptoglobin research. The group suggests using their ability to communicate to end the war, but that it is already too late and that this war can only end with elimination of one side and the control of Futurum (the planet). Eva upon all this being stated starts having another breakdown, kills Sirei before the group can pull her away. Shouma starts having an incredible headache similar to previous times he recalled something, is left in charge of Eva, as everyone else disbands.
Battle against a squad that keeps begging for death.

Shouma reveals that before arriving here we all had our memories erased, and that is almost able to remember where they all come from, why they were chosen, and how things ended up like this. He wants to absorb Eva to learn the truth to prevent us from doing things we can't go back from, arguing that we've already done enough to her that death would be a kindness.
Eva starts to beg for her life, alternating between asking not to kill her and to kill her. Shouma kills her.
Takumi delivers the materials Tsubasa needs to repair Sirei.

Shouma with regained memories tells the SDU that their memories are false and were implanted into them. Further he reveals that the SDU members were created and grown in the Kamukura General Hospital, and spent their entire lives in tubes until they awoke in the classroom 67 days ago. Further that the genes they were cloned from was Shino, which is why everyone in the SDU has hemoanima. Naturally, the SDU takes this news very badly and starts to disbelieve it, however Yugamu backs it up by saying that everyone's DNA is remarkably similar, nearly identical, and that Shion is effectivly their father. Naturally this also goes over weirdly.
Nozomi begs Sirei's shutdown body for answers to questions she still has, demanding he wakes up so she can know.

Nozomi convinced Tsubasa to reboot Sirei, after he is Nozomi demands her unaltered memories back, which she gets. She then goes to Takumi and starts telling him this. Further, she remembered Takumi, and how when she was younger she would wander around the hospital while her mother was busy with work, and eventually found her way into the room with all the machines in them, upon looking inside she saw Takumi. Takumi in this state opened her eyes and smiled at him, and it felt like she made a friend. She would continue to return to that room time and time again and take to Takumi in the machine. Once when talking to him his eyes even opened a little, and then lifted his arm and put his hand on the glass, seemingly trying to reach and touch Nozomi. For Nozomi this was confirmation that he could hear her and wanted to be friends. Eventually though, Nozomi was found and had her memories of this erased. All of this confirmed that Takumi did in fact know Nozomi, and this likely mixed with fictional memories of the TRC he was being fed in the pod. This appears to be the reason that Takumi knew a version of Nozomi (Karua). Nozomi attempts to use this to convince Takumi to continue living, that those memories were in some way real, that the memories they've made since arriving here were real. Nozomi promises to protect the SDU who are her friends.

Battle against an invader group, Sirei wakes up and begs the SDU to get out there and fight after apologizing for the manipulations and saying they were unforgivable, but asks that they go out to help Nozomi who is out there alone.
Takumi joins the battle on the third wave to protect Nozomi and the rest of the SDU.
Moko and Hiruko join the battle.
Takemaru, Yugamu, and Shouma join the battle.
Kako, Ima, Gaku, and Tsubasa join the battle.
EITO JOINS THE BATTLE!

A holographic projection of V'ehxness appears on the field to speak to the SDU. She offers the SDU a deal: surrender now and your deaths will be quick and painless. Tsubasa attempts to suggest peace, it is instantly shutdown by V'ehxness due to what humanity has done to them, stating every last person will fight humanity to their death. V'ehxness also reveals that she has been enjoying the war immensely and hates the idea of peace. The SDU refuses and V'ehxness sends more troops at them.
Sirei informs the SDU of their backstory, confirming Shouma's memories. Further he reveals that the TRC on the satellite is now aware of the truth and of everything that is happening.
Takumi and Nozomi watch the sunrise together.
The SDU comes to the decision to continue to fight, not for humanity, but for themselves, so they can have a better life after.
Takumi enters the cafeteria to find Moko performing a demon banishing ritual involving Sirei dressed as a demon.
Takumi collects black lens and frames for Eito.

Eito and Sirei arrive at the cafeteria where the rest of the SDU is, where Eito is wearing sunglasses. Takumi asks him to remove them, which Eito does, revealing he removed his own eyes. He then shows them the eyes, which he is holding. Now he doesn't have to look at everyone's faces, and asks to be let back on the team now that he no longer sees creatures he hates. Sirei reveals that Eito has been readded to the Revive-O-Matic, and that his information has been altered so that he will revive without eyes. Eito also reveals that after learning the truth he felt empty and disgusted knowing that his rightous dream for humanity was all false, and also that he burned out his nose so he can't smell. He does still want to wipe out of humanity, but he is willing to fight for his "beautiful comrades" [sic]. He again asks to be let onto the team.

branch.name: Allow Eito to Rejoin the Team?

events.name: Sirei orders Takumi to help Eito get settled in and accepted by the team.
Takumi asks Gaku to plan a party to help Eito fit in, he agrees with some manipulation, and asks Takumi to get him a gas canister, a grill, and charcoal.
Takumi delivers the materials to Gaku, who then requests a saw and lumber.
Gaku pranks Takumi by screaming for help and having him rush in to save him. Takumi, after dealing with that, gives him the materials.
Gaku rushes into Takumi's room after the morning annoucement and informs Takumi that preperations are ready for the party to start at sundown, and that he didn't sleep at all last night.

Everyone arrives at the school yard for the party, as Gaku lights a giant campfire. Eito opens up about his feelings and how he felt after learning that his hatred and his feelings weren't real and that he wanted to die after learning all this and feeling empty. The group begrudgingly accepts him and who he is, especially as he's started to fix himself. Takemaru was mostly hungry.
Nozomi asks Takumi to go on a date with her after all this.

Takumi wakes up the next morning looking at the sky, and sees a commander directly behind him, who then begins talking and ridiculing the group for what he percieves as issues. He then states that V'ehxness has ordered him to destroy this place, but he entered mostly to see what the SDU was like before starting.
Battle against Squad 0. This is confusing to the SDU as neither Takumi nor Eito knew anything about him, further he looks similar to Muvrum, who is revealed to be his son.
Takumi is beheaded by the commander.
Takumi enters the war room to find out that after being beheaded the commander said that the matter with his son was settled, and that he would be back later.
Battle against Squad 0.
The Squad 0 commander Dalh'xia is sprayed with Yugamu and Nozomi's poison gas, severely weakening him.

Dalh'xia reveals that he defied V'ehxness, and that what he desired most was to die on the battlefield as a warrior, which is why he is so grateful to the SDU. Further he reveals that the "battle pets" are actually humans and futurans who have been biologically modified into pure killing machines, which is why Dalh'xia was overthrown by V'ehxness for standing against them. V'ehxness appears and absorbs Dalh'xia.
V'ehxness informs the SDU that she is preparing an event for her ascention to godhood, and that their battle will take place then.
V'ehxness sends the SDU a video file of her informing the SDU that they have developed weaponry similar to what humans have used. She further states that the battle is in 2 days, on day 99.
Sirei puts together a pep rally for the SDU to strengthen their bonds as much as possible before the final battle.

Everyone enjoys the festival, making sure Shion has a good time and fits in with everyone. Shion says that he is proud he can stand as a person and expierence human emotions, and how happy he is to be a part of the SDU and their friend. Everyone gets the maximum enjoyment out of the pep rally.

Nozomi asks Takumi about what she said the other day, and Takumi says he wants to go on a date. However, Karua is still on his mind, Nozomi reassures him that Karua does exist, somewhere inside of him. However, Nozomi does still want to see Takumi after, if he feels like it after everything is resolved. Right after she came down with rejection symptoms, and Takumi forbids her from fighting tomorrow, saying he'll protect her.

Day 99 begins with the alarms going off, and a crowd of invaders storming in to the school grounds. Nozomi bursts into the war room demanding that she is allowed to fight, to stand with and protect the friends she holds so dear, and that she made another poison trap. The SDU enters the battle.
V'ehxness enters the battle.

V'ehxness blasts the SDU with her own undying flames. She also reveals she has created an undying flame weapon herself, and will be using it to burn the SDU to ash, as a massive missile impacts the artifical satellite.

V'ehxness gloats about destroying all of humanity, and states that the SDU's entire reason for fighting is gone. Takumi reveals that they never had anything to begin with, and they will fight to protect each other, their friends.
The Final Battle begins.
Shion hits her with a full force attack, immoblizing her, as Nozomi places the poison trap spraying her.
Takumi mortally injures V'ehxness as she screams that there is nothing but despair left for this planet, before exploding.

Takumi proposes stopping the final attack, however the only way to do so is to destroy the machine in the Defense Room. However, this would involve killing Shion. The group fully agrees with the idea of stopping the attack. However, moments before they can leave to go do it Sirei appears and informs the group they have been relieved of duty and that their infusers have been confiscated. Further, the Will of Humanity has dictated that the attack must occur, and that the people of this planet must be destroyed for humanity to live in peace.

route.name: 001: Last Defense Academy 2nd Scenario: Farewell, Last Defense Academy

events.name: Takumi elects to defy Sirei one last time, and the group agrees. Sirei as such says he is forced to eliminate everyone at once, however a shot rings out as Nozomi shoots Sirei directly through the head. Sirei's dying message is that the mission and Last Defense Academy can not be stopped, as the Will of Humanity takes over his speaker and starts screaming to kill the planet. Nozomi fires another shot to fully disable Sirei. The graduation music begins to play as the academy switches to attack mode and informs the group that the missiles will be launched in 600 seconds. Nozomi forces the group to promise that everyone will come back alive. Yugamu hands the group their infusers, and they all rush to the defense room, leaving Nozomi to wait in the cafeteria for their return.

As the group arrives at the Defense Room, they find the undying flames around the door already retreating. They transform via hemoanima and smash through the door, with 400 seconds remaining. The PA system annouces that intercept mode is active, and starts an alert that there are intruders in the Defense Room. After this a mechanical body with Shion's form visible in the chest appears, and makes copies of itself out of undying flame. As the group begins one last battle to destroy this body and prevent the attack, with 300 seconds left.

As everyone falls, Takumi absorbs them, before finally directing one last attack at the central machine and Shion. As the academy is blown apart, Takumi is launched outside to Nozomi. He explains what happened, and passes on the wishes of the group and himself to Nozomi, telling her to live on, and live on fully for them.

Nozomi buries Takumi and spends multiple days at his grave, crying. Finally she brings herself to leave the academy, and begin walking, through the empty cities and streets. Eventually she collapses, and is found by a group of Futuran children. Whom she reaches out her hand to, and one of them takes, as the dawn breaks.

route.name: 002: Reset: Welcome to Last Defense Academy

events.name: The SDU decides not to fight against Sirei as he doesn't want to risk the SDU's lives any further. However Nozomi collapses from rejection symptoms, she however states that the cryptoglobin will soon leave her body forever. Right after the graduation music begins playing, as the SDU gathers in the schoolyard, as they watch the school enter attack mode. The SDU worries that the pod won't work if there is no more satellite, Sirei shows up and informs them that he has changed the destination. Further he states that goal has changed, and that the will of humanity is for them to survive, crossbreed (note: Nozomi is the only human), and build a new humanity. He also states that he will survive as the flames will only affect living creatures. Shion then shows up to say goodbye to the SDU and thanks them, asking them to live their lives happily. Finally the SDU boards the escape pod, and watches as the planet is destroyed. Takumi remembers what Sirei said just before they left, that he can ready a new simulation for the group and overwrite their memories so they can live in peace without the knowledge of what they've done. Takumi states he's already made up his mind.

Takumi, with no memories, wakes up on a new day 1, in a classroom surrounded by an SDU that he does not know. The rest of the group states they also do not know each other, and that all they can recall is basic details about their personality and past. Shouma was really popular in his class, Eito loves humanity, Yugamu was in a family of physicians, and Gaku was raised in an average home with an average family. Just then, a message appears on the blackboard telling them to greet their commanding officer, as Sirei appears and informs them of their new mission: survive and protect themselves as they are the only survivours of a destroyed world. He states that their goal is to build a new world and civilization, live, fall in love, etc.

route.name: 003: Goodbye Eito Route: Praying For Your Happiness

events.name: Takumi rejects Eito and allowing him to join the team. Eito allowed himself to get his hopes up and finds them crushed, deciding to leave the academy. Sirei says he will take care of it and will lead Eito out, Eito also asks to discuss something in private with him. Then we swap to Eito's perspective.
Sirei provides Eito with a few days of rations and Eito sets off. He heads towards Second-to-Last Defense Academy to take shelter and find more rations as Sirei suggested.

Eito after many days (literally day 8X) finds himself at Second-to-Last Defense Academy. He also then contemplates Sirei giving him an undying flame bomb, with the purpose of blowing himself if V'ehxness wer eto come for him to prevent her from absorbing him. He wills himself to press the button, to end his suffering and the man known as Eito, but finds himself unable to.

2 days after the last event, Eito hears screaming and then multiple sets of footsteps approaching. He waves them down and allows them to stay, all the while they say nothing, he heads back inside and says to follow him inside if they want. He leads them to the cafeteria, and is given his bag after being unable to find it, but they don't respond when he asks if they did. Finally the group finds food and eats. Eito falls asleep. Later that night, Eito is awoken by a Futuran child asking why he was alone. He answers that he did something bad and had to leave his friends and he can't go back. They also reveal that they can't go back, because they broke their promise and left home, then were chased by monsters and unable to find their way back. Eito informs the group that there should be a map around they could use to find home. The girl however sits down next to him, asking him if there's no chance of forgiveness, which he says their isn't. She is also worried she won't be forgiven.

The next morning Eito is awoken by the girl, who leads him outside to inform him that monsters are approaching. Eito asks if they have found the map and the way home, which they have, and offers to fight back the monsters to let them escape. The children are worried they won't be forgiven even if they make it home. Eito convinces them to try and make it home and redeem themselves. The battle begins, with Eito swinging everytime he felt himself hit ensuring he would always hit a target. He finds himself beaten down, his weapon knocked out of his hand, he finds himself under a pile of monsters. He reaches into his bag and brings out the bomb. He recalls the false memories he had Sirei embed into him, happy memories with the SDU, praying for their victory and their happiness.

Takumi and the SDU decide to abandon humanity, refusing to continue to be humanity's puppets. Sirei commends their conviction, however he begins to activate their bombs as they are now rebels against humanity. However, the bombs refuse to go off, because Eito already destroyed the detonation transmitter in the war room preventing their detonation. Takumi kills Sirei in one hit, Shion briefly mourns him but says its for the best.

Eito comes to Takumi's room after the morning annoucement and rings the doorbell, reminding Takumi he can escape easily. He then asks Takumi to let him rejoin the team, but that he doesn't want to attack the satellite. Further, he gives Takumi a detonator for his bomb, and states that after yesterday he believes in them now and conceptually likes them (still hates looking at and hearing them however).  Takumi allows him to rejoin the team.

Takumi enters the cafeteria to find everyone getting along with Eito due to them all being comrades. Further they decide to try and make contact with the Futurans and live peacefully with them rather than just retreating and lying low.
The SDU gathers at the front door and prepares to leave the school, with some setting out to make contact and discuss, and some staying back to defend if needed.

After finding nothing but campfire remains the day before, prat of the SDU once again sets out to see if they can find anyone. This time they find a child being attacked by a group of invaders, which they quickly dispose of. Takumi to calm th child after offers them some chocolate. The child says they were warned by the maiden to not talk to the children of the stars, instead they tell the child to tell the maiden about them and hope for a reply with a messenger arrow Tsubasa made that can be shot back through the wall.

Eito comes to talk to Takumi after the morning annoucement, with news that an arrow has come back through the wall. Eito, Nozomi, and Takumi let the Maiden through the wall. They open discussions and she says that she has heard of Takumi's name before, and that she knows about them being born from Shion. She reveals that V'ehxness rules as a dictator, which was brought about by the war humanity started. She also reveals that V'ehxness has taken possesion of the Boxes of Blessing, alongside the process to create the invader monsters. The Maiden reveals her name as Kamyuhn, the sole person in the rebellion she controls who has divine blood. She offers the SDU the choice to join them or not.

Takumi and the SDU elect to join the rebellion, however right after, Dahl'xia appears behind them. He states that Kamyuhn would be betraying her people by allying with the SDU. He allows the SDU to gather and transform and begins a battle. He also reveals that V'ehxness sent his son Murvrum to war and an early grave and hates her for that. Just as the SDU is panicking realizing they can't break through his armour, Kamyhun shoots an arrow through his armour, causing him to detransform. She reveals she did this with her divine knowledge and was able to make an arrow that could do that. After the fight Kamyuhn stays at the school as a liason between the rebellion and the SDU.

Kamyuhn while eating reveals that the Futurans also have ramen, curry, miso, and soy sauce. The SDU starts discussing their dreams and what they want to do after, as this is happening Shion reveals himself.

Nozomi comes to Takumi's room in the morning to inform him that the SDU is throwing a welcome party for Kamyuhn in the gym. once again Kamyuhn and the SDU discuss the similarities of their cultures and histories. However, Kamyuhn brings up Eva, her mother. However she says she brought it up in order to forgive the SDU, to show that she understands the circumstances that led to it.

Takumi wakes up to an attack on the school by Dahl'xia. Kamyuhn has the SDU hold off Dahl'xia until she can prepare and fire another arrow to pierce his defenses. Dahl'xia and the SDU face off in a true battle with both sides fighting for their own cause, however the SDU is able to prevail and defeat him. Just as he is dying however, V'ehxness appears and absorbs him, stomping on him after to prove her point.
Takumi wakes up and walks downstairs to find Nozomi patching up Kamyuhn's sleeves, and finds out they have been spending some time together and forging a bond.

Takumi goes to the caf to find the SDU eating as much as possible and trying to make one last silly memory before everything changes. Afterwards Eito asks Takumi to come to the war room later as he has proof of something. Takumi goes and is informed that the artificial satellite has started to move towards Futurum, likely to make a general attack.

The SDU decides to take a photo of themselves as a graduation photo and print enough copies for everyone. The photo turns out amazingly with all members, including Shion and Kamyuhn. However right after, Nozomi faints. After Takumi carries her to her room, once she wakes up she informs him and Kamyuhn that she has been suffering rejection symptoms for a little bit now. Later in the night Kamyuhn comes to Takumi's room to inform him that there is a potential way to save Nozomi, however it requires a willing transfer of cryptoglobin although it would kill the donor. Kamyuhn asks that if she were to die in battle or die another way to perform the transfer then as she could at least save Nozomi who would guide the future well.

Attack by V'ehxness' squad, however before the battle starts, Shion asks the SDU to kill him and absorb him so he doesn't destroy the planet on day 100. Eito offers to do it so no one else has to, but Takumi rejects it saying that they will absorb him together, which they do. Eito after states he is starting to feel affection for the SDU. Finally they begin their final battle. However midway through, the satellite descends through the cloud layer, the SDU decides to fight both V'ehxness and the humans. As V'ehxness falls she states that the SDU has no future, as they will be hunted forever by humanity until they are all dead. Right after she finishes speaking, she blows herself up, fatally injuring both Kamyuhn and Nozomi. Kamuyhn again offers her cryptoglobin to Nozomi so she can at least survive, Nozomi counters by offering her remaining cryptoglobin to Kamyuhn. The choice is left to Takumi.

branch.name: Who Are You Going to Save?

events.name: Takumi elects to save Nozomi, following Kamyuhn's dying wish, as she passes away peacefully. Takumi understands that was he has picked was selfish and likely doomed the planet.
Many years later, Nozomi and Takumi have set up a school from which they teach new generations the concepts of peace.
Takumi decides to save Kamyuhn over Nozomi, as it was Nozomi's wish and what is best for the future of the planet.
15 years later Takumi and Kamyuhn stand proud, after their negoations have worked out, with humanity agreeing to a peace after all of Futurum has united under their leadership.

The SDU decides not to join the rebellion as it may be a trap. After they suggest taking Kamyuhn in for interrogation, she starts swinging a weapon, stabbing and killing Nozomi, after which Takumi in a rage kills Kamyuhn who curses them as vile wicked invaders who killed her mother in the same way.
Years later Takumi struggles to survive as war has broken out between what remains of the Futurans and Humanity who has begun chemical warfare, Takumi hasn't seen the rest of the SDU in years.

Takumi refuses to sacrifice Eva to learn the truth, despite the team's reservations. Upon Takumi reminding Eva that she has reasons to live, she begins to break down and state she doesn't want to die. Shouma starts to charge at her, but Eva attacks Shouma, stabs him through the heart, and ends up absorbing him. Hiruko then orders her restrained as Eva passes out. The SDU digs a graves for Shouma and burries him.

Takumi heads to the cafeteria where some members are gathered, they decide to move the key to Eva's cage to the war room, and to move Eito's cage away from Eva's. Hiruko proposes killing Eva as to prevent any more SDU deaths.

Takumi decides to go check on Eva in the courtyard, where she reveals she has no memory of what happened after the battle. She asks Takumi to pass any punishment he sees fit, but Takumi refuses to do it. She asks when she will be let out so she can continue following orders. Takumi decides to let her remain.
Takumi once more goes to see Eva, and talks with her for a while. He asks if Eva had a family before, causing her to break and start crying then pass out.

Takumi enters the cafeteria, shortly after Nozomi enters and tells him he may want to stop seeing Eva so much as its giving a bad impression to the rest of the SDU. Takumi refuses, as its the only way he can help settle his guilt. Afterwards he once again goes to see Eva. He asks if there's anything Eva wants to do, specifically asking if there's anyone she misses, he specifically asks about Kamyuhn. This causes to break once again, however this time she seems to be aware of things, as if the brainwashing if wearing off. The brainwashing seems to be fully wearing off and Takumi asks her to keep quiet so the rest of the team doesn't kill her if they realize. She calms down, and starts putting together what happened what happened when she was brainwashed. She asks if he really wants to save her, and Takumi answers he does. She then reveals that Sirei brainwashed her and that if the others find out they will kill her. She then asks if he really will keep this a secret from his allies.

Takumi once again goes to see Eva, smiling upon seeing him and saying that she ought to consider how she felt having to wait all alone. However she then follows it up with she was just trying to make him feel bad, then states that they are enemies, the invaders and invaded. She asks what happens now, she isn't expecting to be set free, but she would like to know. She also asked why the SDU hated her so much, not remembering that she killed Shouma, Takumi lies and says that he died in battle. They discuss the nature of being forced to fight in a war neither of them wanted.
Takumi runs into Tsubasa who says she is fixing Sirei and is expected to be done in 3 days (Day 71), giving Takumi a time limit on his decisions.

After breakfast Takumi once again goes to talk to Eva. They discuss how they have similar cultures, histories, bodies, etc. She then starts telling Takumi about her daughter, Kamyuhn, and that her birth parents tried to oppose V'ehxness and were killed for it. Further thta V'ehxness killed them in front of Kamyuhn. Takumi shifts quickly to asking about the Futuran God, Eva answers with some of the history, mostly that the God offered 7 Boxes of Blessing and 6 Boxes of Calamity. Takumi after hearing about their history and Kamyuhn, decides to break Eva out of the school.

Takumi wakes up and goes to the courtyard, untying Eva and trying to unlock the cage. However, Hiruko shows up with several others and reveals the key was swapped for a dummy one, just after Sirei shows up. He then informs Eva that she killed Shouma and absorbed him. Hiruko suggests restraining Takumi. However just as they close in, a flash grenade goes off and someone pulls Takumi and Eva out to the courtyard. Once they can see again they find its Eito, who reveals he could have broken out at any time, and elected to to save Takumi who has now become an enemy of humanity. Eito then gives them a parting gift of food, equipment, Takumi's infuser, and a fire extinguisher, as he retreats back into his cage. Takumi and Eva run from the school. Just after, Nozomi appears and discusses events with Eito, who states that it was her who asked for his help and let him out. Afterwards in the war room Hiruko and Sirei discuss events, and Hiruko suggests leaving Eito alive and not going after Takumi and Eva as they are bound to eventually come crawling back and that the SDU needs them to survive.

Takumi and Eva wonder around outside for a few days, almost out of energy. Discussing events from time to time, trying to find food and water, and struggling to survive. Finally they are exhausted, stuck lying in the sun, discussing everything. Eva says she is at peace when with Takumi and would not mind dying holding hands with him.

Takumi is woken up by Eva in a small camp, where she reveals that Kamyuhn managed to save them at the last moment. She welcomes him to the rebellion headquarters. Takumi learns that the rebellion is the underground group opposing V'ehxness and that Kamyuhn has assumed control of it. Kamuyhn informs Takumi that she and Eva have to share a tent, but that she's sure that won't be a problem for them given how Eva favours him, and how also likes her.

After many days of a peaceful life for Takumi and Eva at the camp, only fighting off minor invader squads, they discuss events. With Takumi's guilt over abandoning the SDU, and Eva over letting her daughter take up such a burden of command and breaking the biggest tabboo.

Kamuyhn and Takumi discuss Eva in the morning, with her revealing that as Eva's daughter she can never be an equal or partner to her like Takumi can. Saying that if Takumi keeps this up she may even call him Father some day.

Kamyuhn informs Takumi and Eva that Dahl'xia has been released, but that he was defeated by the SDU. However the school recieved significant damage and that the undying flames had vanished, meaning there was no longer enough flame for the attack on the 100th day, and that V'ehxness will launch an attack soon. Kamyuhn says that they will watch and hope the threats take care of each other.
Kamyuhn states that her recon teams have spotted V'ehxness heading towards the school and that she will attack on day 99, Eva stells Takumi to follow his heart.

Takumi elects to go save the SDU. In the morning he prepares to leave, however Eva comes out before he can. She understands that he will leave and that he would try to do it alone, she also reveals that she loves him and she is going with him even if it means standing against her sister. [Editor's Note: Clair De Lune is playing]. Kamyuhn also comes out, willing to let her go, knowing te rebellion can take out whoever remains. Takumi and Eva arrive at the SDU just as they are being defeated, however just before she can attack the 3 remaining members (Eito, Nozomi, and Hiruko), Eva steps in and blocks her attack. V'ehxness slices through Takumi easily. V'ehxness and Eva argue about her choices and how just now she is finally willing to stand up to her. The two transform and are equally matched in battle. V'ehxness chastises her saying she will never understand what it is like to absorb another's power, however Eva goes berserk making V'ehxness realize she has, and welcoming her for it, saying they really are family. Takumi cheering on Eva until both sisters are exhausted. They lose their transformations and attack each other, Eva killing V'ehxness, however Eva is left completly exhausted from the fight, and has the life drain out of her as she tells Takumi she loves him.
Takumi decides not to go back to the SDU, but instead stay with Eva.

Takumi and Eva wonder the wasteland together months after the SDU is defeated, with Eva pregnant and them trying to avoid V'ehxness. Kamyuhn has been out of contact as she's busy leading the rebellion which is being slowly stomped out. Eva feels the baby kick as they discuss how it will them a reason to celebrate when it is born.

route.name: Chapter00_0_a LEFT BRANCH RIGHT BRANCH RIGHT BRANCH
Route 1 Right LEFT BRANCH LEFT BRANCH RIGHT BRANCH
Route 1 Right LEFT BRANCH RIGHT BRANCH

events.name: Takumi lies and says he found Eito's diary that contained his plans. They are very skeptical of him, and go to get Eito's side of the story. Hiruko leaves last, looking at Takumi and simply going "Why?" with a shocked expression. In the hallway Sirei and Takumi discuss why he didn't tell them, and Takumi says he didn't want them to not trust him as they wouldn't believe he isn't a time traveller. Sirei agrees and decides not to say anything. Afterwards Takumi goes to see the SDU in the courtyard, where they decide to let Eito live. Afterwards Takumi talks to Eito alone, where he says he went along with what Takumi said, keeping that night as their little secret. The entire SDU agrees to fight after hearing what Sirei has to say about their mission and their world. Later that night Hiruko comes to Takumi's room to interrogate him, she didn't find a diary in his room, and she believes Takumi came from the future. Upon getitng her confirmation, she goe sto leave, but Takumi asks why she reacted the way she did at first. She says she'll sleep on it, but says hiding he was a time traveller and keeping Eito alive were good decisions.

Sirei appoints Takumi as leader of the SDU, to agreement from the SDU. Takumi and Hiruko talk afterwards, where she says she has changed her mind and decided not to tell him everything, especially since she has seen this play out before. Takumi later goes to try and get the truth out of Hiruko, finding her later and talking with Sirei, unable to hear what was said. Eventually, Sirei gave Hiruko something that fit into the palm of her hand. Takumi goes to Hiruko's room later to try and discuss something with her, but finds her missing, he then sees her exit the wall of fire and leave. He tries to follow her out, and eventually sees her and tries to follow her. He finds her in a facility and in a room with many machines, and pulls open a locker to find many outfits that appear to be like deep sea diving outfits, which she puts on. She also then says she needs to make the leap soon, she steps onto the centre machine and prepares. However Takumi tries to stop her and he thinks she will vanish, jumping at her. When Takumi comes to Hiruko asks what he was possibly thinking jumping in without a leap suit. She says that trying to perform a parallel leap without a leap suit puts incredible strain on the body. She reveals its already past midnight and on day 5. She tells him to stay here and rest as she leaves to go back to the academy. She opens a locket with 2 extingushers, which shouldn't be possible as Takumi left his outside, takes it, and leaves. Takumi ignores this, grabs the other extingusher and goes after her. He makes his way back to the school and inside, looking for Hiruko. He finds the morgue unlocked, and finds Eito's body under a sheet in it. Then he hears a loud noise above him, in the infirmiary, just to find Hiruko collapsing. He tries to shake her awake, which she does, but then she kicks him in the stomach and launches him. She then begins to strangle him, he passes out. When he comes to he sees a corpse recovery drone get sucked into the revive-o-matic with someone in the suit watching, then blacks out again. He wakes up, Hiruko informs him that she failed and "couldn't save him", she takes Takumi back to the leap room to go back. Further she also informs Takumi that she's not worried about Eito's body or Takumi seeing it. Finally Takumi suits up, and then preforms a parallel leap with Hiruko. Finally they go back to the academy, and Takumi goes to sleep.
